73a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i srad du zhe na/ com ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par
73a5('bum): shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma lagasamangon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis
73a6('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnas grangs des sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bshes rab kyi pha rol tu byed/ 
73a7('bum): sa myod pa'i che mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par gyi 'byo'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan ya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha ro nga tu phyid dpa po spyod
73a8('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzind nams kyi sgo rnams ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis stong ste/ ting nge 'dzin nas
73b1('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi sgo ma lags/ ting nge 'dzi rang gi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin gi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa 'i/ 
73b2('bum): kyang ting nge 'dzin gi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzinang gi sgo thams
73b3('bum): la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par myi
73b4('bum): bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzungs kyi sgo
73b5('bum): rnams ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang ste/ nga ba nyid ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan
73b6('bum): 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang
73b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di
73b8('bum): ltar gzugs myi rtag pa nyid gzugs myi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs myi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs myi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs myi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa
74a1('bum): nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs kyi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs kyi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
74a2('bum): bos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'byor pa'i tshe/ gzugs kyi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba myi rtag go zhes gnas par myi
74a3('bum): bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ 
74a4('bum): tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor / rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des ma byang chub/ 
74a5('bum): sems dpal sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas paramyi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin lal 'byod
74a6('bum): pa'i che/ 'du shes kyi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de nI'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes kyi rtag pa nyid 'du shes myi rtag nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi stong
74a7('bum): pa nyid ga lags pa de yang 'du shes kyi rtag pa nyid ma yonas 'atsushes kyi rtag pa nyid las gung na yang mthob nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes kyi rtag pa nyid tu byung pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes kyi rtag panyid
74a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das nam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha 'oyod tu phyind pas spyod pa'i tshe// 'du shes kyi nyag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi 'gyim// 
74b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po lnga pa'o// / des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed myi rtag go zhes gnas pa/ 
74b2('bum): myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed myi rtag pa nyid 'du byed myi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed myi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed myi rtagapa
74b3('bum): nyid ma lags 'du byed myi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed myi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed myi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
74b4('bum): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu
74b5('bum): phyird pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag go zhesabagyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa nyid rnam
74b6('bum): shes pa myi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes la myi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong
74b7('bum): nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa kyi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpalasems dpa' chen pos
74b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa s+ya teg zhi go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
75a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid la
75a2('bum): gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma
75a3('bum): mchis te/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
75a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sdug bsngal lo// zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi 'gyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes
75a5('bum): bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi
75a6('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor
75a7('bum): sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes gnas par
75a8('bum): myi 'argya'o// nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myib kyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes sdug
75b1('bum): bsngal ba nyid 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid ga pa lags pa de yang 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na
75b2('bum): yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa'
75b3('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes
75b4('bum): gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'aras de ni 'di ltar 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du byed sdug bsngal pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid ga
75b5('bum): pa de yang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du/ 
75b6('bum): byed sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das nas grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha ro yod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bkyi
75b7('bum): gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam
75b8('bum): shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags
76a1('bum): rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do// 
76a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyirnyed pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// 
76a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
76a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs bdag myed pa nyid gzu gas bdag myed pa nyid kyis gong ste/ gzugs bdag myed ba nyid gang lags pa re sa pa gzugs bdag myeng pa nyid
76a5('bum): lags pa/ gzugs bdag myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong da ma mchis te/ gzugs bdag myeng ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid / ngas nyid kyang gzugs bdag myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'a
76a6('bum): nas grangs des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa sa chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i seM/ gzugs padag byed do nams kyi bar gnas par bye bgyi'o// des shes rab kyis rob
76a7('bum): bal spyod pa'i tshe cher ba bdag byed do zhes 'bye bar gnas par myi la gyi ste/ de ci li srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba bdag myeng pa nyid tshor ba bdag myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba dang / 
76a8('bum): byed pa nyid kyi stong ba nyid ga sa lags pa de la tshor ba bdag myeng ba nyid sa lags tshor ba bdag myeng pa nyid las gu dayang spong ba nyid ma mchis te/ chor pa padag myed pa nyid kya thong ba nyid tha pas nyid
76b1('bum): kyang tshor ba bdag myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das nas grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyidad lal pyod pa'i tshe tshor ba bdag skyed de zhes gnas par gyi
76b2('bum): myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes bdag
76b3('bum): myed pa nyid 'du shes bdag myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes bdag myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes bdag myed pa nyid ma lags 'du shes bdag myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa
76b4('bum): nyid ma mchis te 'du shes bdag myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes bdag myed pa nyid do// bcom lda nga na 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
76b5('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed
76b6('bum): bdag myed do zhes gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di sbyar 'du byed pa dag myed pa nyid 'du byed padag myong ba nyid kyis mtho' ste/ 'du byed nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags
76b7('bum): pa de yang 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid ma lags 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed bdag myeng la nyid kyi stong pa nyid stol pa nyid kyang 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid
76b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das nas grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed bdag skyed do zhes bkyi bar gnas pa myal rgya'o// ras
77a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bkyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa
77a2('bum): bdag myed pa nyid rnam par shes pa bdag myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa bdag myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa bdag myed pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa
77a3('bum): bdag myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa bdag myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa bdag myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des
77a4('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa bang / myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'ad
77a5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs zhel zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen
77a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs zhi ba nyid gzugs zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid ga pa lags pa de yang gzugs zhi ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs nyi zhi ba nyid las gud
77a7('bum): na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes ra
77a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor bzhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bkyi sa
77b1('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba zhi ba nyid tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid kang lags pa re yang tshor ba zhi ba nyid ma lags/ tshor ba zhi pa nyid las
77b2('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor bzhi pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba zhi pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das nam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
77b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor bzhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i
77b4('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes zhi ba nyi 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes zhi ba nyid ma lags
77b5('bum): 'du shes zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub seMs
77b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed zhi'o
77b7('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed zhi ba nyid 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed
77b8('bum): zhim nyid la lags/ 'du byed zhi ba nyid las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub/ 
78a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed zhi'o zhes bgyi bar myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe
78a2('bum): rnam par shes pazhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas kyi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid rnam par shes pa zhi po nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa nya zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa
78a3('bum): nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnab she la zhi pa nyid de/ 
78a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sa rnams dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod 'a/ rnam par shes pa zhi'i zhes bkyi bar gnas par gyi 'gyi'o// 
78a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'byod pa'i che/ gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi
78a6('bum): re ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs stong pa nyid gzugs stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs stong pa nyid ma lags// gzugs
78a7('bum): stong pa nyid las gung ma yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs spyod pa nyid kyab stong pa nyid pa 'i pathong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das nas grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
78a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi 'gyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba stong ngo zhes bkyi bar gnas par bya/ 
78b1('bum): bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba stong pa nyid tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ka lags pa de yang tsho pa stong pa nyid la sags / tshor ba stong/ 
78b2('bum): pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
78b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi
78b4('bum): bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes stong pa nyid 'du shes stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kang lags pa de yang 'du shes stong
78b5('bum): nyid ma lags 'du shes stong pa nyid las kud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid sto/ pa nyid kyang 'du shes stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rna
78b6('bum): grangs des du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// res shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
78b7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed stong pa nyid 'du byed stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi
78b8('bum): stob pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed stong pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed stob pa nyid las gud na yang stom pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed stong pa nyid do// bcom
79a1('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des
79a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid rnam par shes
79a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par
79a4('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par / das pa stob pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zhes rab kyi
79a5('bum): pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa steng zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen pos
79a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mtshan ma myed do zhe bya bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mtshan ma myed pa nyid gzugs
79a7('bum): mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs mtshan ma myed pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs mtshan ma myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa
79a8('bum): ma mchis te/ gzugs mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mtshan ma myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
79b1('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi 'gyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba mtshan ma myed/ 
79b2('bum): ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par gyi bgyis/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tsho pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba ma can ma myeng pa nyid kyi stong pa
79b3('bum): nyid kang lags pa de yang tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba
79b4('bum): mtshan ma myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes ra kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba mtshan ma
79b5('bum): myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bkyi ste/ de ci'i slad
79b6('bum): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa nyid 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes mtshan ma
79b7('bum): myed pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa nyid do// 
79b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// 
80a1('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed mtshan
80a2('bum): ma myed pa nyid 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid las
80a3('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
80a4('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
80a5('bum): shes pa mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma myang
80a6('bum): myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid las kud na yang
80a7('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das na grangs des byang chub sems dpal sos
80a8('bum): dpa' chen po sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i sa rnam par shes pa mtsham ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
80b1('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs smond pa myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs smond pa myed pa
80b2('bum): nyid gzugs smond pa myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs smond pa myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de lnga gzug smond pa myed pa nyi ma lag/ gzugs smon pa myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis
80b3('bum): te/ gzugs smon pa myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs smond pa myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
80b4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs smon pa myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phya nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba smon pa myed do zhes bgyi bar kA
80b5('bum): par myi bkye ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshe slon pa byed pa nyid tshor ba smon pa myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba smond pa myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang la
80b6('bum): yang tshom ba spon pa myed pa nyid ma lag rtsor bgrod byed pa nyid las kung na sa stongapa nyid ma mchis te// tshor ba smon pa myong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor basmod pa myed panyi
80b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba smond pa myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// ras
80b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ 'du shes smond pa myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes smond pa myed pa nyid 'du
81a1('bum): shes smond pa myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes smon pa myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes smodad pa myed pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes smond pa nyid las gud na
81a2('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes smon pa myed pa nyid kyang stod pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes smon pa myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen pos
81a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myor ba'i tshe/ 'du shes smod da 'askyed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ba'i tshe/ 'du byed smond pa myed do zhes 'gyi bar
81a4('bum): gnas par myi ba kyi ste/ re ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'ang sa de'i 'di ltar 'du byed smon pa myed pa nyid 'du byed smo myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed smon pa myed pa nyid kyi smos
81a5('bum): pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed smon pa myed pa nyid ma yang / 'du byed smond pa myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma ma sa te/ 'du byed smond pa myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
81a6('bum): kyang 'du byed byed pa byed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das nas grangs des dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol ba tu byedad pas spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed blod pa byed do zhes
81a7('bum): kyi bar gnas par gyib kyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin du lal myong 'ami rnam par shes pa spod dpa myed do zhes bgyi'ang gnas par gyi bkyile// de ci'i srad du nanabacom ldan 'das dang
81a8('bum): 'di ltar rnam pa na shes pa smon pa myed ga nyid rnam par shes pa smin pa myed pa nyid kyis stong ste// rnam par shes pa smo da pa myeng pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gangasags pa des nas pa shes pa blo dang na myed pa nyid
81b1('bum): lags pa rnam par shes pa smond pa myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa smond pa myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa spodad pa myed pa nyid do// 
81b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa smond pa myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// 
81b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i srad du zhen/ 
81b4('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs dben pa nyid gzugs dben rab nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs dben pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs
81b5('bum): dben pa nyid las kung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs dbes pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs res na byang chub ses
81b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nga byeng ba'i / gzugs dben ni zhes bgyi ba gnas par gyi 'byin// des shes rab kyi pha roso du phyin da pas myong ra
81b7('bum): dben no zhes bkye bar gnas par gyi bkyis/ de ci'i srang bu de na bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di sa tsho ba dben pa nyid tshor ba dben pa nyid kyis thong ste/ tshor ba dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid ga sanas par
81b8('bum): yang chom la dben pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba dben pa nyid las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
82a1('bum): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyin pa sa spyod pa'i rtsa tshor ba dbyed na zhes bgyi bar gnas par byid bya'o// des shes rab kyi pha ros tu byis/ 
82a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i sa/ 'du shes dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de mi 'di ltar 'du shes dben pa nyid 'du shes dben pa nyid kyis spyong ste/ 'du shes dben
82a3('bum): pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes dben pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du ge dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes dben pa nyid
82a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das nas grangs des na byang chub sems dpasems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod dpa'i tshe/ 'du shes dberan no zhes bgyi bar gnas par gyi bgyi
82a5('bum): nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byed pa'i tshe/ 'du byed dben mo zhes 'gyi bar gnas kyis kyi ste/ de ci'i srad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed dben pa nyid 'du byed des
82a6('bum): panyid kyis sto ste/ 'du byed dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed dben pa nyid la lags/ 'du byed dber pa nyid las gung na yang stong pa nyid sa ma ris te/ 'du byed dace pa nyid tu
82a7('bum): bas nyid stongs nyid kyang 'du byed dben pa nyid do// cos ldan 'das nam grangs des su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa shes rab kyi pha ro sang tu byed du pas myong 'du byed rje ngon
82a8('bum): zhes 'phyi bar gnas par phyi 'bya'o// des shes rab kyi pha ro sod tu phyin pa la myod pa'i me/ rnam par shes pa dben no zhes 'byi bar gnas par gyis kyi'o// de ci'i slad du dang/ co mo ldan 'ad
82b1('bum): de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa/ 
82b2('bum): dben pa nyid las gud na/ stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub seMs
82b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs
82b4('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis
82b5('bum): stong ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags de yang de bzhi na nyid ma lags/ de bzhin nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyidam mchis te/ de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
82b6('bum): de bzhin nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par myi bgyi'o// 
82b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos nyid la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
82b8('bum): de ni 'di ltar chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ chos nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos nyid ma lags/ chos nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyi stong pa nyid stong pa'i
82b9('bum): kyang chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas myod pa'i chos nyid
83a1('bum): gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi dbyings la gnas par myi bkyi
83a2('bum): ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos kyi dbyings las
83a3('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
83a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la ga nas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
83a5('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos skyon myed pa nyid la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos skye/ na myed pa nyid chos ston myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ chos skyon
83a6('bum): myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos skyon myed pa nyid ma lags/ chos skyon myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos skyon myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos skyon
83a7('bum): byed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos skyon myed pa nyid la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom
83a8('bum): ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
83b1('bum): de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' stong ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 
83b2('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu byind pa la sbyor
83b3('bum): pa'i tshe ba yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
83b4('bum): bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la dad kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// 
83b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi phral/ 
83b6('bum): gnas pa'i yid kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
83b7('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bar dag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du shes la gnas na/ de 'du shes mngon par 'du 'bya
83b8('bum): ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la myi pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
84a1('bum): mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du byed la gnas na de 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan// 
84a2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rnam par shes
84a3('bum): pa la gnas na de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind la la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs
84a4('bum): dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su za/ nad par myi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor de la snyoms par 'jug par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab
84a5('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// bcu ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
84a6('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis myig la gnas na de myig mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ 
84a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
84a8('bum): bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rna ba la gnas na de rna ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
84b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sna la gnas na/ de sA la
84b2('bum): mngon par 'du bgyi ba la khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rolar tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
84b3('bum): thabs kyi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang 'dag gi ra bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lce la gnas na/ de lce mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi pyod do// bcom ldan 'dra/ 
84b4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi la la gnas pa'i yid kyis lus
84b5('bum): la gnas na/ de lus mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi zhes ra ba kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la myi dpyod do// bcom ldan 'ad/ sa gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes ra
84b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir 'gyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yid la gnas no// de yid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
84b7('bum): phyi nad pa la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su zi nad par myi 'gyur/ shes
84b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor da la snyoms par 'jug par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur da par rnam pa thams cad mabye dad pa nyid du 'byung bar byir
85a1('bum): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la
85a2('bum): gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la 'apyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pal myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
85a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sgra la gnas na de sgra mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab
85a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'dasadagal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rabakyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
85a5('bum): bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis dI la gnas na/ de tri mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan
85a6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rol kan+da
85a7('bum): na de ro mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mya spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
85a8('bum): pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis reg la gnas na/ de reg mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mya
85b1('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid
85b2('bum): kyis chos la gnas na/ de chos mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
85b3('bum): dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ yongs su zi nad par myi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor de la snyoms par 'jug par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind
85b4('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu
85b5('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis myig gi rnam pa/ ra shes pa la gnas na/ de myig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par
85b6('bum): 'du bgyi ba la khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
85b7('bum): mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de na pa'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa la
85b8('bum): myi pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la kanra
86a1('bum): yid kyis snga'i rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de sna'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi sa la khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin las myi dpyod // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs
86a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la la gnas pa'i yid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pas gnas na/ dmye'i
86a3('bum): rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dpal myi myod // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
86a4('bum): la myod pa'i che thabs kyi mkhas pas bdag du bkra ba de bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes da la la gnas na/ desus kyi rnam par zhes pa mngon pama'
86a5('bum): 'gyi la la 'khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pal myong pa'i
86a6('bum): thabs kyi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'ju bgyi pha la 'khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
86a7('bum): byin pas kyi byed de// de 'a sa byang chub sems dpa' sems da chen po'i na rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa so su glebar kyi pha rol sa phyi dpa'i
86a8('bum): 'byor da la snyoms par 'jug par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyu rang par rnam pa thams cad mkhye dad pa nyid du 'grub par myi 'gyur ro// thecom ldan 'das
86b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis myig gi 'dus te reg pa
86b2('bum): la gnas na/ de myig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
86b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du ba bya
86b4('bum): ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
86b5('bum): myi mkhas pas bdag gir bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de sma'i 'du sa te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha
86b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag
86b7('bum): gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
86b8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lus kyi 'dus
87a1('bum): te reg pa la gnas na/ de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' seMs
87a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de yid kyi 'dus te
87a3('bum): reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi
87a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la yongs su zi nad par myi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor de la snyoms par 'jug/ par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yongs su
87a5('bum): rdzogs par ma gyur da par rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byangachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
87a6('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen/ 
87a7('bum): kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
87a8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
87b1('bum): mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
87b2('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod
87b3('bum): kyi shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu
87b4('bum): bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de lce'i 'dus te regadapa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab
87b5('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pas myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu byind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag
87b6('bum): du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bkyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi lal khyod kyi zhes rab kyi sa
87b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang
87b8('bum): bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mngon par 'dub kyi ba la khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
88a1('bum): pa la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su zi nad par myi 'gyur/ 
88a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor de la snyoms par 'jug par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar myi
88a3('bum): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la
88a4('bum): gnas pa'i yid kyis sa'i khams la gnas na/ de sa'i khas mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub ses
88a5('bum): dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis chu'i khams la gnas/ 
88a6('bum): na de chu'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
88a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis mye'i khams la gnas na/ de mye'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
88a8('bum): las myi pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir
88b1('bum): bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rlung gi khams la gnas na/ de rlung gi khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
88b2('bum): dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gar bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis nam mkha'i khams la gnas na/ de nam
88b3('bum): mkha'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
88b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ra ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa'i khams mngon par
88b5('bum): 'du bgyi ba la dpyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la mya dpyod do// de ci'i sred du zhe na/ namangon pa 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems da/ pa' sems dpa' chen pos na shes rab kyi pha ro sa tu phyin pa yongasasu zin par myi 'gyur
88b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor de la snyoms par 'jug par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur da par rnam pa thams cad mnyend pa nyid du 'byung bar
88b7('bum): myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la
88b8('bum): gnas pa'i yid kyis ma rig pa la gnas na/ de ma rig pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' seMs
89a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gar bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du byed la gnas na de 'du byed la
89a2('bum): mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
89a3('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi
