130b6('bum): bstong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig ko rnam par shes pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam
130b7('bum): par shes pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam
130b8('bum): shes pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong
131a1('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ra / 
131a2('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pal po'o
131a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed cing myi
131a4('bum): dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang / ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / 
131a5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
131a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong
131a7('bum): ba nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te res
131a8('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed cing myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed cing myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed cing myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te/ 
131b1('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed cing myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa
131b2('bum): nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang
131b3('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed
131b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa'i khams myed cing myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams myed cing myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams myed cing myi dmyigaso
131b5('bum): rlung gi khams myed cing myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / 
131b6('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / 
131b7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / 
131b8('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ma rig pa myed pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du byed myed cing myi dmyigs so/ rnam par shes
132a1('bum): myed cing myi dbyigs po// bying dang gzugs byed cing myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug myed cing myi dmyigs so// reg pa myed cing phyi dmyigs so/ tshor ba myed cing phyi dbyigs so// sred pa myed cing kyi/ 
132a2('bum): dmyigs so// len la skyed cing myi dmyigs so// srid pa myed cing kyi dbyigs so// skye ba myed cing myi dbyigs so// rga shi myed cing phyi dmyigs so// ma ba ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / bya thong
132a3('bum): nyid dang / phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa snyos
132a4('bum): pa nyid dang / thog ma dpa pa ma skyed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba skyed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thos cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
132a5('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sbyidang pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed cing myi dmyig pod
132a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa skyed cing myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol
132a7('bum): du phyin pa skyed cing myi dmyigs so shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pag ra dwa ti'i bu na pa stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi pa stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
132a8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong
132b1('bum): pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / 
132b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkabapa rnams
132b3('bum): skyed cing myi dmyigs so// dbang po rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// stobs rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
132b4('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa da nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa
132b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog/ sa dpatha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa
132b6('bum): dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
132b7('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la myed cing myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan bzhi myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshad byed pa bzhi myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
132b8('bum): par 'jug pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad myed cing myi dmyigs so// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa
133a1('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin de rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
133a2('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// snying rje
133a3('bum): chen po myed cing myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu na pa stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stongapa
133a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong da nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong panyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang / 
133a5('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stob pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa
133a6('bum): rang dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngobo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed cing myi dbyigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
133a7('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed cing myi dmyigs so// dgra bcom pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// rang byang chub myed cing myi dmyigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed cing myil
133a8('bum): dmyigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa ga ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi na pa stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
133b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / dod das pa song pa nyid dang / 'dus byas spong ba nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid dang / mthal las 'das ma stong pa nyid dang / thog sa dngas ma myed pathong sa nyid da dam pabyed bathongs/ 
133b2('bum): nyid dang / rang bzhin sto pa nyid dang / chos thams cad thobs nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid sto pa nyid dang / phyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po skyed pa stong pa nyid da / ngom nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos
133b3('bum): byed ral thobo nyid stob pa nyid kyi phyir mun dadas de bzhin nyid myed kying byi dmyig so sa nong de bzhin nyid myed cing kyi dmyigs so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid myed cing byi dbyigs po sa nyid myed cing myi byin no/ 
133b4('bum): 'gyu kyi nas da byenas pod byedapa nyid byed ci sa dag pa'i sa pa'i spyod cing byed bye pa

134a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed cing myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyang myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su byed pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid myed cing
134a2('bum): myi dmyigs so/ phyi dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// phyi nang dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su
134a3('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chen po stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i
134a4('bum): phyiradon dam pa stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
134a5('bum): dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed cing
134a6('bum): myi dmyigs so/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid med cang ma dmyig su myed pa'i
134a7('bum): phyir/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir
134a8('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed
134b1('bum): pa'i phyir myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i/

134b3('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te de ltar rtog cing sems pa dang / de ltar rtags cad sems pa'i tshe sems zhum pa myed cing yongs
134b4('bum): su yum 'byed lag myi 'jigs kyi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o// spras pa che dang /

134b6('bum): dwAd+ha ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
134b7('bum): chol la ni yom pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu zhes so// 'du shes ni 'dug
134b8('bum): kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste ga de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin
135a1('bum): dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa ni rnam par she
135a2('bum): pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig ni la
135a3('bum): myig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rna ba ni rna ba'i rang bzhin dang bral
135a4('bum): ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta babazhin du rab tu shes so// sna ni sna'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/

135a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lus ni lus kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' ses
135a7('bum): dpa' chen po gos rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid ni yid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
135a8('bum): tu phyi nad pa la pyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa ga ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
135b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tsheyang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// sma ni sgra'i rang bzhin gyis bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa/ 
135b2('bum): tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dI ni tri'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba
135b3('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so// ro ni ro'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
135b4('bum): re ka ni reka gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpasems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos ni chos
135b5('bum): kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' seM sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan
135b6('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa yi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa
135b7('bum): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
135b8('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nod pa la
136a1('bum): pyod pa'i che nga yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab
136a2('bum): kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
136a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' ses
136a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg
136a5('bum): pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rna bo'i 'dus te
136a6('bum): reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
136a7('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg po ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
136a8('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu zhes/ 
136b1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// 
136b2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// 
136b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
136b4('bum): tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de
136b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab/ tu shes so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni sna'i
136b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
136b7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
136b8('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
137a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhi
137a2('bum): dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams ni
137a3('bum): sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chu'i khams ni tshul
137a4('bum): khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral la ste/ de byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'itshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mye'i khams
137a5('bum): ni mye'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
137a6('bum): rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nam
137a7('bum): mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
137a8('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi
137b1('bum): du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji
137b2('bum): lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
137b3('bum): shes so// rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
137b4('bum): shes so mying dang gzugs ni mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang / bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shesang rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba
137b5('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpas chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
137b6('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so / reg pa ni reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag
137b7('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes po gatshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
137b8('bum): rab tu shes so / sred pa ni sred pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa la pyod pa'i che/ yang dag pa yi lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ 
138a1('bum): len pa ni lend pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
138a2('bum): srid pa ni srid pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// skye ba ni
138a3('bum): skye ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rga shi ni rga shi'i rang bzhin dang bral
138a4('bum): Tha ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab da kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'gyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba zhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin
138a5('bum): za'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang zhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshi ga yang dag pa
138a6('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
138a7('bum): ga la myod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
138a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bzon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang
138b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang
138b2('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shes rab kyi
138b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa
138b4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral rab ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
138b5('bum): du rab tu shes so// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin// dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ngo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag
138b6('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
138b7('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyi
138b8('bum): tsheyang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la 'apyod kyi
139a1('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
139a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
139a3('bum): rold tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
139a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pal pyod pa'i tshe/ yang / dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang
139a5('bum): bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
139a6('bum): nyid ni thag ma dang tha ma myed pa stang pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
139a7('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
139a8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
139b1('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
139b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste
139b3('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / 
139b4('bum): bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shes so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos
139b5('bum): po myed po myed po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ debyang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ra
139b6('bum): tu shes so / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa
139b7('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
139b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa ga ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ 
140a1('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni yang dag par spong ba
140a2('bum): bzhi'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhin rdzul
140a3('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dbang po lnga ni
140a4('bum): dbang po lnga'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dang la sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la phyo/ dpa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
140a5('bum): stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
140a6('bum): tu shes so/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta
140a7('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni lam gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'byod pa'i tshe/ yang
140a8('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ 'phags pa'i bden pa gan ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa sa
140b1('bum): pyod pa'i tshe ga yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bsam gtan bzhi ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod de/ 
140b2('bum): cheyang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshad myed pa bzhi ni tshad myed pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ 
140b3('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
140b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' ses
140b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mthar da kyis gnas pa s+t+wa~M sa bA 'jug pa dgu ni mdzad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin dang bra ba ste
140b6('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa smon pa
140b7('bum): myed pa ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ 
140b8('bum): tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
141a1('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ting nge 'dzind rnams ni ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
141a2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
141a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste
141a4('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro// de lad tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ rab tu shes so// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni myi 'jigs pa'i rang
141a5('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa la ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// so so yang dag par rig
141a6('bum): pa bzhi ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
141a7('bum): byams pa chen po na byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
141a8('bum): snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
141b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag/ 
141b2('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
141b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shes so// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems
141b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang
141b5('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dgra bcom
141b6('bum): nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ 
141b7('bum): rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
141b8('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta
142a1('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
142a2('bum): rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
142a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ma nor da ba de bzhin nyid ni ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
142a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin / 
142a5('bum): kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos nyid ni
142a6('bum): chos nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos nyid dbyings
142a7('bum): ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
142a8('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid ni chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste ga de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
142b1('bum): shes so// chos skyon myed pa nyid ni chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
142b2('bum): rab tu shes so/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
142b3('bum): dU rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan ba sha ra dA ti'i bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o// 
142b4('bum): brgya'ab pham pa dgu pa'o// // smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'du shes kyi rang
142b5('bum): bzhin ni ri la bu 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu ma rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu// myig gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ swA'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i rang
142b6('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu lus kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu yid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sgra'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tI'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ro'i rang bzhin ni jis
142b7('bum): reg gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu chos kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni
143a1('bum): ji lta bu/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu// myig gi 'dus te regs pa'i rang
143a2('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 
143a3('bum): sid kyi 'dus te rag pa'i rang bzhin na las lu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu// byig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ma ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen dkyis
143a4('bum): tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

143a6('bum): ji lta bu/ mye'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ma rig pa'i
143a7('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ skye mched drug gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji
143a8('bum): lta bu tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu sred pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ le nad pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ srid pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ skye ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rga shi'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu
143b1('bum): sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin 'i/ 
143b2('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu// nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ phyi stong pa nyid
143b3('bum): kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu
143b4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'dus ma bya/ sa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
143b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang zhin ni ji lta bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
143b6('bum): ni ji lta bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang
143b7('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 
143b8('bum): rdzu 'bruld kyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'phag
144a1('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu'aphags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta
144a2('bum): bugazugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par thard pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 
144a3('bum): rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzungs

144a5('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bubyams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu
144a6('bum): rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu yan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji

144b1('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngo sa po myed do//

147a8('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa
147b1('bum): la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / mying dang gzugs la mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / skye mched drug la skye mched drug gi rang bzhin myed pa dang / reg pa la reg pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / 
147b2('bum): tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / sred pa la sred pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lend pa la lend pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / srid pa la srid pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / skye ba la skye ba'i rang bzhin
147b3('bum): myed pa dang / rga shi la rga shi'i rang bzhin myed pa dang // sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la tshul khrims kyi
147b4('bum): pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhi dan myed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson
147b5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
147b6('bum): pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang // nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / phyi nang stong
147b7('bum): la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / spyod pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / don dang
147b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi
148a1('bum): rang bzhin myed pa dang / mthal las 'das la stong pa nyid la ma' lalas 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / thog sa dpatham myed la stong pa nyid ma thog sa dpa tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
148a2('bum): kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / dor po myed pa stong pa nyid 'dor ba myed pa stong pa nyi kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thos
148a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / 
148a4('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ra bzhin myed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa 'i kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 'i
148a5('bum): la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ra bzhin myed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag
148a6('bum): par spong ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / dbang po rnams la dbang po'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / stobs rnams la stobs kyi rang bzhin myed
148a7('bum): pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'phags pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnaMs
148a8('bum): la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams la tshad myed pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
148b1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rnam par tha ra pa brkyang la rnam par tha rad pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i stobs par 'jug la dgul
148b2('bum): mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang
148b3('bum): smond pa myed pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams la ting nge 'dzind kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnaMs
148b4('bum): la gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs de pa'i stobs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin myed dpa dang / myi 'jigs pa la myi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin myed par
148b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig yal so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang tho na myed pa dang / snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sangs
148b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rgyun da tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la lan cig phyira'ob ba'i 'bras
148b7('bum): bu'i rang bzhin byed pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sa phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid sa dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rang byang chub la rang byang chub kyi mang ni
148b8('bum): byed pa dang yas ki nam mashes pa nyid la lam kyi rnam bshes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa ngade bzhim
149a1('bum): nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / ma no da pa de bzhin nyid la ma nor da pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rang / 
149a2('bum): bzhin myed pa dang / chos nyid la chos nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chos kyi gnas nyid la chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chos skyon myed pa
149a3('bum): nyid la chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin myed par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan
149a4('bum): nyid myed do// tshor ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// 'du shes/ la 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid myed do// 'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid myed do// rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan
149a5('bum): nyid myed do// myiga' la myig gi mtshan nyid myed do// rna ba la rna ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// sna la sna'i mtshan nyid myed do// lce lalce'i mtshan nyid myed do// lus la lus kyi mtshan nyid myed do// 
149a6('bum): yid la yid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid myed do// sna la sna'i mtshan nyid myed do// dri la dri'i mtshan nyid myed do// rol ro'i mtshan nyid myed do// reg la reg gi mtshan nyid myed
149a7('bum): chos la chos kyi mtshan nyid myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa la myig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa
149a8('bum): la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa sa lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// yid kyi rnam sa
149b1('bum): shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// 
149b2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed
149b3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la mtshan nyid myed do// rna ba'i 'dus
149b4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i mtshan
149b5('bum): nyid myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la lce 'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tsham ga la lce'i 'dus te reg
149b6('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshom ba ma mtshan nyid myed dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
149b7('bum): la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// sa'i khams la sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid myed do// chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid myed do// mye'i khams la mye'i khas
149b8('bum): kyi mtshan nyid myed do// rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid myed do// nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtsha
150a1('bum): nyid myed do// ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// 'du byed la 'du byed la mtshan nyid myed do// rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// mying dang gzugs la
150a2('bum): mying dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid myed do// skye mched drug la skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid myed do// reg pa la reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// tshor ba sa tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// sred pa la sred pa'i mtshan nyid
150a3('bum): myed do// le nad pa la lend pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// srid pa la srid pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// skye ba la skye ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// rga shi la rga shi'i mtshan nyid myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la
150a4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i mtshan nyid byed do// tshul khris snye kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin / mtshan nyid myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bzod
150a5('bum): ba'i pha rol da tu phyi nad pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
150a6('bum): bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do/ 
150a7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// chen po stong pa'i
150a8('bum): pa chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// 'dus ma byas
150b1('bum): stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma myed
150b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// chos thams cad stong
150b3('bum): pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mtshan nyid myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi
150b4('bum): mtshan nyid myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
150b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnaMs la dran pa nye ba gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams la
150b6('bum): yab dag par spang ba rnams kyi yang dag par spong ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// dbang po rnams la dbang po'i mtshan
150b7('bum): nyid myed do// stobs rnams la stobs kyi mtshan nyid myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi sad kyi mtshan nyid myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la lam kyi mtshan
150b8('bum): nyid myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid myed do// tshad myed pa rnams la tshad myed pa'i mtshan nyi
151a1('bum): myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la' gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// rnam par tha rad pa rnams la rnam par tha rad pa'i mtshan nyid mye'o// 
151a2('bum): mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la rnam
151a3('bum): par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// ting nge 'dzind rnams la ting nge 'dzind gi mtshan
151a4('bum): nyid myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi sgo'i mtshan na myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcul de bzhin gshegasaba'i stobs kyi mtshan nyid myed do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi la gyi
151a5('bum): 'jigs pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// so sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi la so so yang dag par rig pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// byams ba chen po sa byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid myed do// 
151a6('bum): snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid myed do// rgyan tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sa chunang tu zhugs pa'i
151a7('bum): 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid myed do// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid myed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid myed do// 
151a8('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la dgra bcom pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// rang byang chub la rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid byed do// rnam pa
151b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// de bzhin nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid la ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid kyi
151b2('bum): mtshan nyid byed do// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// chos nyid la chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// chos kyi dbyings la chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid myed do// / 
151b3('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid la chos kyi gnas nyid kyi mtshan nyid byed do// chos skyon myed pa nyid la chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid myed do// 
151b4('bum): mtshan nyid la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin myed do// mtshan nyid da kyi rang bzhin la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin myed do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems
151b5('bum): dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor kyis spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ka ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ 
151b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'dis thob pa de ni nas pa thams cad sa khyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ me dang ldan pagar dwa ti'i bur mas
151b7('bum): ltar chos thams cad ma skyes ma byang ba'i phyir ro// spras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da ji ltar na chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba yin/ rab 'byor kyis spras pa/ me dang ldan pa ka ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs
151b8('bum): gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshor ba tshor bas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// 'du shes 'du shes kyis
152a1('bum): grong ste/ des skye ma yang myi daphyogs 'byu ba yang kyi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa ga re dwa ti'i bu phyig byig gis stong ste/ des skye ba yang kyi dmyigs 'byung sa yang gyi dbyugs so// nab rnas stong
152a2('bum): de la skye ba yang gyi dbyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// sA mas spong ste/ des skye ba yang gyi dbyigs 'byung ba yang gyi dbyigs so/ bre sres stong ste/ res skyems dbyi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi myig so// 
152a3('bum): sa kyim pa sa skams kyi dmyigs 'gyu gyi dmyigs pa/ yid med kyis spyong bya kyi byen pa 'ams gyi khyon pa'o// tshe dang ldan
152a4('bum): tra ti'i bu gzugs kyis gas/ des skye ba yang kyi dmyigs 'byung ba ya myi dbyigs so/ sra smras songs/ des kyi sang kyi dbyig pa 'byung ba sa kyi phyin pa po ri ba grong de
152b1('bum): par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// lus kyi
152b2('bum): par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba
152b3('bum): yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i
152b4('bum): 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byungab yang myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te/ reg pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi
152b5('bum): dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong/ ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigaso// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste
152b6('bum): de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shar
152b7('bum): dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang phyi dmyigs so// rdza ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
152b8('bum): tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas
153a1('bum): stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs
153a2('bum): 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te res
153a3('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba snga myi dmyigs so// sa'i khris sa'i khas kyis stong ste de pa skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so/

158b7('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du shes myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mas
158b8('bum): spyod do bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
159a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa na pashes rab kyi ma ma tu phyin pas myod pa'irje thabs kyi mkhas pas 'du byed kyi rtag ces bgyi bar myod ma mtshan mas kyang ngo // 
159a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
159a3('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'dra/ 
159a4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
159a5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thababs myi mkhas pas 'du byed bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// 
159a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed zhi zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'byor do// bcom ldan
159a7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das
159a8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
159b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
159b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' ses
159b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind ma la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
159b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar gyod ma mtshan ma la 'apyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs
159b5('bum): dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa sdug bcwa sa zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
159b6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab rgya pha rold tu phyind pa sa spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag ces 'bye bar spyod na mtshan ma sa pyod do// com
159b7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtsham ma la spyod ro
159b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas bsdu zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
160a1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das la
160a2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya
160a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i rtsa/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar khyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang
160a4('bum): chus sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin dpas spyod pa'i / thabs kyi mkhas pas phyig rtag ces bkyi par myong ma mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
160a5('bum): chu bamams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin ba la spyod 'a'i che / thabs kyi mkhas pas myig kyi rtag ces 'bye bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang
160a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa
160a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rtse/ thabs kyi mkhas pas myig sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan mas myong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal mas
160a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig bdag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'al chen
160b1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
160b2('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig zhi zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
160b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod bI tshe/ 
160b4('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas myig dben zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' seMs dadapa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe
160b5('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas myig myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa/ 
160b6('bum): tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi
160b7('bum): mkhas pas rnab kyi rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'apyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da lal pyod pa'i che/ thabs kyi mkhas las na
160b8('bum): labade zhes bgyi bar 'apyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal 'apyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rna ba sdug bsngal zhes
161a1('bum): bgyi bar 'apyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba bdag ces bgyi/ 
161a2('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na/ 
161a3('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ 
161a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi ma khas pas rna ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
161a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
161a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rna ba myi dben zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom
161a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas sku rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
161a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna myi rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs
161b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
161b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
161b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la yod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
161b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pa ngas sna bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
161b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pa sa sna zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
161b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas snam zhi zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
161b7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas sna dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
161b8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
162a1('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas lce rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
162a2('bum): thabs mya mkhas pas lce myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya
162a3('bum): mkhas pas lce bde zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyi nad pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce
162a4('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
162a5('bum): bas lce bdag ces bgyi bar dpyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// ba'adas ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi
162a6('bum): mkhas pas lce bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
162a7('bum): bas lce zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce ma zhin
