163b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs/ myi mkhas pas yid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 'byod// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
163b5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi ma khas pas yid myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
163b6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes ra
163b7('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha
163b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
164a1('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
164a2('bum): rang pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
164a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
164a4('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs zhi zhe/ bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
164a5('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ka la te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
164a6('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
164a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
164a8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sgra rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
164b1('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas sgra myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
164b2('bum): smra bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sgra sdug bsngal zhes bgyi
164b3('bum): bar myod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sgra bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
164b4('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sgra bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ 
164b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sgra zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
164b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sgra ma zhi zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'byor ro// bcom ldan
164b7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sgra dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
164b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sgra myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
165a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dri rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
165a2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dri myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
165a3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tra bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
165a4('bum): la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tra sdug bsngal zhes pa kyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
165a5('bum): phyi nad pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tri bdag ces pagyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
165a6('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dri bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la
165a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas dri zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi
165a8('bum): mkhas pas rdzi ma zhi zhes bgyi bar myong na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rje
165b1('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tri myi dben zhes bgyi
165b2('bum): par spyod na mtshan ma la myod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ro rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan
165b3('bum): ma la yod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ro mya rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
165b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ro bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
165b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ro sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la

165b7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ro bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das la
165b8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ro zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs
166a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas ro ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshams la myod ngo do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
166a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i che/ thabs kyi mkhas pas ro dben zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems das/ 
166a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ro myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
166a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas/ pas reg rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcoldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
166a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas reg myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
166a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas reg bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
166a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas reg sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
166a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas reg bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
166b1('bum): phyi nad pa la dpyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas reg bdag skyed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
166b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas reg zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ 
166b3('bum): sa myi mkhas pas reg ma zhi zhes bgyi bar byor na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya
166b4('bum): mkhas pas reg dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi

166b6('bum): thabs kyi mkhas pam chos tag ces pakyi bar khyod nam can sa sa byed/ bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pal spyod pa'i sa 'bas kyi sa las
166b7('bum): bas chos kyi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas

168a7('bum): pa bdag ces bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la myod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam

169a8('bum): par shes pa chag zes bgyi bar khyod na ma marnams spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byad chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha ros pa tu phyin pas spyod pa'i sa/ thabs kyi mkhas las du

170a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma

170a6('bum): bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug sngal
170a7('bum): zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag
170a8('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes

175a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
175a7('bum): gal te byang chub sems/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod
175a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub snyems dpa' snyoms dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi ma'as pas myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na
175b1('bum): tshun ma la myod de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems de'a' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sdug
175b2('bum): bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 'khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa la sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas myig gi 'dus te reg
175b3('bum): ba'i rkyend kyis tshor bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig
175b4('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bdag myed ces bgyi bar skyodan mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub se rnams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
175b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig gi 'dus te re ga pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la phyo da do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
175b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'byor pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar dpyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
175b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'dra
175b8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
176a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi/ 
176a2('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
176a3('bum): kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
176a4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar myod/ na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
176a5('bum): pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs phyi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs
176a6('bum): dpa' mams na kyi nas pa'i da pa kyi 'du she na da kyi da dme spyod do// bcom
176a7('bum): gal te byang sa dpa' daM pA la myod pa'i tshe/ sa myi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
176a8('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba li 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
176b1('bum): zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mas bye do/ ba nim ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te/ 
176b2('bum): reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi ba ma spyod na mtshan ma sa myod ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i rtse thabs kyi
176b3('bum): mkhas las rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
176b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg po'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' ses
176b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
176b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces bgyi bar
176b7('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
176b8('bum): tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas snal
177a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar gyor na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
177a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
177a3('bum): romang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
177a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas sA'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bzhi zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
177a5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phyerol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na
177a6('bum): mtshan ma la khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub ses sa/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba des
177a7('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sA'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
177a8('bum): kyis tshor ba myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la khyod dosabacom ldan 'das gakha te byang rgya sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas khas lce
177b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind la la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas/ 
177b2('bum): zas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi rtog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa la
177b3('bum): thabs myi mkhas pa sa lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
177b4('bum): tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dza sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
177b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
177b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das

178a3('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myod pa'i cha thabs kyi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
178a4('bum): rkyend kyis tshorab rtag ces pakyi dum myod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen so zhes rab kyi pha rolab tu phyin pas myod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi ma
178a5('bum): bas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ston kyis tshor ba myi rtag ce skye bkyi myong sa mtshan ma la gyud do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang du sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bzhes rab kyi pha ros tu byin
178a6('bum): pyod pa'i che babs rgya mkhas pas sus kyi 'dun te rnyeg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bkyi ba gyod na mtshan ma sa myod do// bcom ldan 'das g.ye byang chub sems dpa' sems man tshan log sa rab kyi ra/ 
178a7('bum): rgya byin pa sa bya 'a bcas kyi mazhus pas sus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen dkyis tshor ba drug pas pa zhes kyib byor namaldan pas byed do// cos ldan 'das ga kyang chu sems dpa sems dam mam
178a8('bum): kyi rlo pa gyung ba gargyas kyi skams pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi ba gyod nas canam sa byed do// bcos pan 'dasag ma da

178b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi sa das pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben zhes

178b6('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsho ba bye ben zhes kyi bam byed na mtsha mas kyang do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thozhes rab kyi pha ros patu byin du pa sa spyod pa'i tshe

180a6('bum): pal gyod pa'i cha thabs kyi mkhas pas chu'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
180a7('bum): thabs myi mkhas khas chu'i khams sdug bsngal zhes lagyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi
180a8('bum): mkhas pas chu'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
180b1('bum): chu'i khams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chu'i khams
180b2('bum): zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chu'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar
180b3('bum): 'byod na mtshan ma la 'gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chu'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ca
180b4('bum): gyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang bachub sems dpa' sems da 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pal pyod pa'o// thabs kyi mazhan chu'i khams kyi dben zhes bkyi bar myod na mtshan mas myed/ 
180b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' ches po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pal 'gyod pa'i che / thabs kyimakhas pas lce'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma sa myong
180b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe / thabs kyi mkhas pas mye'i khams kyi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 'khyobyod do// 
180b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind lal pyod pa'i cha/ thabs kyi mkhas pas mye'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das
180b8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mye'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan pa la 'apyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas/ 
181a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas mye'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs/ 
181a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mya mkhas pas mye'i khams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la myod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
181a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas mye'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
181a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pa sa mye'i khams la zhi zhes bgyi bar myod ma mtshan mas myong ngo // dbacom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
181a5('bum): po shes rab kyi sa rol da tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / thabs kyis bas pas kye'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar myod namatshan ma sa gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
181a6('bum): dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas mya'i khams kyi dben zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan pa sa gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chu thamams dpa' sems dpa
181a7('bum): na pa shes rab kyi sa rob du byin du pas spyod pa'i / babs kyi mkhas pas rlung gi khams rtag ces bgyi bar myo mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa mam pa dang ma med sonapa ma
181a8('bum): kyi ba rol tu phyid pa sa byed pa'i gags kyi mkhas las rlung gi 'ams kyi rtag ces babyi la khyod namatshan su la yod do// bcom ldan 'das gsas byang chu sems dpa sem sa dpa' chen sozhes rab kyi ma ro
181b1('bum): phyind pa la 'gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
181b2('bum): tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rlung gi khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod dong / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ 
181b3('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bdag ces bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
181b4('bum): mkhas pas rlung gi khams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpalas rnams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
181b5('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas rlung gi khams zhi zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan mal 'apyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa la sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod
181b6('bum): tshethabs myi mkhas pas rlung gi khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
181b7('bum): gyi mkhas pas rlung gi khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la byed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la khyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas
181b8('bum): rlung gi khams kyi dben zhes bgyi bar 'khyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyiradapal gyod pa'i thabs kyi ma 'amalas rnam pa 'a
182a1('bum): khams rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pal gyod pa'i che/ thabs kyi mkhas pas nam mkha'i
182a2('bum): bde zhes bgyi bar khyod na mtshan ma la 'gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'byor pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams sdug sngal
182a3('bum): zhes bgyi bar myong ma mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ka te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol datu byidad pas myod pa'i tshe babs kyi mkhas khas nas mkhachi ba
182a4('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar khyod namatshan ma la byed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi 'olab tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thazas kyi mkhas pas rnam pa
182a5('bum): khams bdas kyang kyis kyi bar kyad nas canas pa spyod da/ bcom ldan 'das gas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ben cishes rab kyi pha rob tu byin dpas spyod pa mas kyimamamams rnamapa ma
182b1('bum): na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
182b2('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma
182b3('bum): la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
182b4('bum): la 'apyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar myod na
182b5('bum): mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug sngam
182b6('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces
182b7('bum): bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag myed ces
182b8('bum): bar pyod na mtshan ma la khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la gyod 'a'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams zhi zhes bkyi
183a1('bum): bar khyod na mtshan ma la yod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byedad pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams
183a2('bum): ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams
183a3('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams
183a4('bum): myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u drug pa'o
183a5('bum): shes rab kya ral tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ pham pa bcu gnyis pa'// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa
183a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas ma rig pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po
183a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas ma rig pa myitag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la myod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
183a8('bum): tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i che thabs kyi mkhas pas ma rig pa bde zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'byod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod payin
183b1('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas ma rig pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
183b2('bum): bas ma rig pa bdag ces bgyi bar 'apyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ma rig pa bdag
183b3('bum): myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ma rig pa zhi zhes bgyi bar
183b4('bum): myod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub semadapa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la phyo/ dad pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ma rig pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar
183b5('bum): gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ma rig pa dben zhes
183b6('bum): bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas ma rig pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar
183b7('bum): khyod ma mtshan mal sa pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'o ma/ thabs kyi mkhas pas 'du byed tag ces bgyi bar khyod na mtshan
183b8('bum): ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod
184a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang lal pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas 'du byed bde zhes 'gyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'apyod do// bcom ldan
184a2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la 'apyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
184a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dang
184a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas 'du byed bdag myed ces bgyi bar dpyod na maHdan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
184a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i cha thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed zhi zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
184a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas 'du byed ma zhi zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la myod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
184a7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas 'du byed dben zhes bgyi bar dpyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
184a8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myikyi mkhas pas 'du byed myi dben zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
184b1('bum): byind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi ma'as pas rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar myong na mtshan ma sa khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyind pa la gyod/ 
184b2('bum): myong ba'i ma / thabs kyi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar khyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i
184b3('bum): thabs kyi khams pas rnam par shes pa 'de zhes bgyi bar khyod na macan ma la khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas myod pa'i rtsa thabs kyi/ 
184b4('bum): mkhas pas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar khyod nas tshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ros cu byind pa la myod 'a
184b5('bum): tshethabs kyi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar gyi dam mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha 'om tu phyin
184b6('bum): myong sa ba'as kyi mams pas rnam pa shes pa bdan byed ces pakyi bar myod na mtshan mas kyang do// bcos ldan 'das gas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thogs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
184b7('bum): pa# zhes bgyi bar gyod na da do/ ldan 'das ga te byang chub sems dpa sems dpa chen pazhes kyi mas nyid
184b8('bum): mazab kyi la'am las rnas par shes pa ma zhi zhes 'gyi mar khyod namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pozhe pa rab kyi pha ros cu byin sal gyod pa'i
185a1('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'byor/ 
185a2('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa
185a3('bum): che/ thabs myi mkhas pas mying dang gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gis rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
185a4('bum): thabs kyi mkhas pas mying dang gzugs myi rtag ces bgyi bar skyo/ da na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
185a5('bum): la byed pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mying dang gzugs bde zhe sa bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
185a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myi dang gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
185a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs kyi mkhas pas skying dang gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi
185a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas pa mying dpa gzugs bdag myed ces bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
185b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mying dang gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind/ 
185b2('bum): pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mying dang gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
185b3('bum): pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mying dang gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la pyod
185b4('bum): pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas mying dang gzugs myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
185b5('bum): phyi nad pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas skye mched dru ka rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
185b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la khyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas skye mched drug myi rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
185b7('bum): tu byin pas byed pa'i ye 'bas kyi mkhas pas skye mched drug bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma sa spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chedan po zhes rab kyi pha rom tu phyinapa
185b8('bum): la 'apyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas skye mched drug sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar 'apyod na mtshan ma la khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
186a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas skye mched drug bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 'amyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
186a2('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas skye mched drug bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
186a3('bum): pa la pyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas las skye mched drug zhi zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'byod do bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
186a4('bum): la 'byod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas las skye mched drug ma zhi zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'apyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
186a5('bum): tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i che ga thabs kyi mkhas pas skye mched drug dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra/ 
186a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas skye mched drug myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
186a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'byod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
186a8('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas reg pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 'gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind lal spyod
186b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs/ 
186b2('bum): gyi mkhas pas reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu byin lal pyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas/ 
186b3('bum): reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas reg pa bdag myed
186b4('bum): ces bgyi bar 'apyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas reg lazhi zhes
186b5('bum): bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gsate byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas reg pa ma zhi
186b6('bum): zhes bgyi bar khyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar pyod/ 
186b7('bum): mamatshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas reg pa gyi dben zhes bgyi bar khyod ma mtshanas
186b8('bum): la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i che thabs kyi mkhas pas tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar gyod namatshan mal byod do// 
187a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tshor ba myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 'byod do// bcom
187a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byab
187a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar 'apyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
187a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/ pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
187a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag myed ces bkye bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'byor do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
187a6('bum): seMs da sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
187a7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha ros da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan la la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi
187a8('bum): pa rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i che/ zhabs kyi mkhas pas sbyor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod ma mtshan ma la khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dang / 
187b1('bum): la pyod pa'i tshethabs myi mkhas pas tshor ba myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
187b2('bum): thabs kyi mkhas pas sred pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
187b3('bum): sred pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sred pa bde zhes
187b4('bum): bgyi bar khyod na mtshan ma la dpyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyind pa la myod pa'i che/ thabs myi mkhas pas sred pa sdug sngal/ 
187b5('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das pa la te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sred pa
187b6('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sred pa bdag myed ces

187b8('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas las sred pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar dpyod na mtshan ma la myod de// 
188a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpal pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas sred pa dben zhes bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la myod do/ 
188a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sred pa gyi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la yod do// bcom ldan 'dra
188a3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lend pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub ses
188a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la da pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lend pa myi rtag ces bgyi dar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
188a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pal pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lend pa bde zhes brgya bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
188a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas len pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs
188a7('bum): dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas len pa bdag ces bgyi bar byor ma mtshan sa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chu'i sems dpa' sems

188b1('bum): bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas le nad pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
188b2('bum): phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas lend pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod
188b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas lend pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

188b6('bum): pa sa myod pa'i ba thabs kyi mkhas pas srid pa kyi rtag ces pakyi bar grong na macanas pa spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpas myod 'i
188b7('bum): thabs kyi mkhas pas srid pa bde zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind lal 'apyod pa'i cha/ thabs

189a1('bum): pas srid pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
189a2('bum): bas srid pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la gyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas srid pa zhi zhes

189a5('bum): na mtshan ma la khyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub se rnams dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas srid pa myi dben zhes

189b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gi rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas las skye ba gyi dben zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
189b8('bum): dpal chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cho yabs kyi mkhas pas ga ga nyig ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
190a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rga shi myi rtag ces bgyi bar myong na mtshan ma la pyod de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
190a2('bum): zo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rga shi bde zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
190a3('bum): rold tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i che/ thabs myi mkhas pas rga shi sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
190a4('bum): phyi nad pa la 'gyod pa'i cha/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rga shi bdag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das kal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
190a5('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rga shi bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la myod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
190a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rga gi zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
190a7('bum): lal pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rga 'i ma zhi zhes bgyi bar 'apyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpal myod 'i

190b2('bum): pas sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi
190b3('bum): mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces lagyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i tshe/ 
190b4('bum): thabs kyi mkhas pas sbyind pa'i pha rol da tu phyind pa bde zhes pa/ kyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
190b5('bum): tu phyind pal 'byod pa'i chethabs kyi mkhas pas sbyin pa pha rol tu phyind pa la sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan mal 'byod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
190b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'apyod pa'i ye thabs kyi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan la la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub ses

191a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i che/ khabs kyi lakhas pa/ de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa rtag ces bgyi zar pyod na mtshan ma/ 
191a5('bum): byed do// bcom ldan 'das kal te byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i babs kyi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha 'oso tu phyin pa kyi rtag ces
191a6('bum): bye bar gyod na mtshan las byed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas myod pa'i sa/ bas kyi ma'am las tshul khrims kyi ma mos tu phyi pa
191a7('bum): bde zhes pagyi bar pyod na sacan pa byed do/ bcom ldan 'das ga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pazhes rab kyi sa ron tu phyin pas khyod pamim zabs kyi la'amasam nus khrims kyi pha rom
191a8('bum): du byin pa sdug las la shes pakyi ba khyod nam can ma sa byed do/ bcom ldan 'das ga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyi pha rom tu phyin dpas myod pa mas kyil mams su

191b2('bum): pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

191b4('bum): pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin/ da pa la ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcomad ldan 'das kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
191b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems

191b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe khabs kyi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te/

192a1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bzod pa 'i pha rol tu phyind pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// 
192a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs myi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
192a3('bum): khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bgyi bar 'apyod na mtshan
192a4('bum): mal pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i dathabs kyi mkhas khas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin dpa bdag myed ces
192a5('bum): bgyi bar khyod na mtshan ma la byed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pa
192a6('bum): rol da tu phyin pa zhi zhes pagyi bar 'apyod namatshan ma la byed do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi yams pa 'thod ba/ 
192a7('bum): la rob tu phyin pa la zhi zhes pa kyi bar myongam mtsham sa sa byad dang / bcom ldan 'das kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpal pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mas pas 'o// 
192a8('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dbe zhes pakyi bam byed na mtshan ma la byed dag bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen lo zhes rab kyi sa rosasas phyin pas khyodamamam rnams kyisamams
192b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu bya nad pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
192b2('bum): pas brtson 'gru kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya
192b3('bum): mkhas pas brtson/ 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar 'apyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
192b4('bum): ba'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chug sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
192b5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
192b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// 
192b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas 'artson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na
192b8('bum): mtshan ma la khyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pal 'khyod pa'i sa thabs kyi mkhas pas bzon 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin lazhi zhes
193a1('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi
193a2('bum): pha rol da tu phyind pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
193a3('bum): bcon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 'gyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
193a4('bum): myi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal tebyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu
193a5('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe ba thabs myi mkhas pas bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sapa
193a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i tshe khabs myi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa kyi rtag ces bgyi bar myong namatshan ma la khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sos
193a7('bum): dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind la bde zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal sa byang
193a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar pyod na pacan ma la khyod do / bcom
193b1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
193b2('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar
193b3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhi zhe
193b4('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bsam gtan
193b5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
193b6('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
193b7('bum): pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la myod do// bcom ldan 'das kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
193b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la 'gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyor ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
194a1('bum): bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub ses dpal ses pa
194a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
194a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dang
194a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
194a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
194a6('bum): khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtsha
194a7('bum): mas byed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rolab tu phyind pa ma zhi zhes kyi
194a8('bum): bar kyang mamatshan la la rtsod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha ro sad cu byind pa sa gyod pa'i / thabs kyi mkham pas shes rab kyi pha ros dacu byin pa
194b1('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi
194b2('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas napa stong pa nyid rtag
194b3('bum): ces bgyi bar khyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la gyod pa'i che/ thabs kyi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid kyi rtag ces
194b4('bum): bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin dpal pyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid bde zhes
194b5('bum): bgyi bar khyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i cha thabs kyi mkhas pas nang spong sa
194b6('bum): nyi thug sasal zhesas kyi mar myod nas can ma sa spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gseng byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen po zhes rab kyi sa'o sa su byin pa la spyod pa'i mi labs kyis 'am pas dang slongs
194b7('bum): nyid padag ces pa kyi ma gyod namacan sa byed do// bcom ldan 'das gas byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyin pas spyod pa'o sabs kyi mamamalas dang thongs nyidas/ 
194b8('bum): byed kyis kyibar bya ngam da dag brtsam 'as nas gas chub sems dpa' sems pa sbyin so zhes pa kyi ro kyid pa sa spyod padang byo nyi ni nas
194b9('bum): kyi bar gyod mamacan pas kyang dag bcol ldas 'das gas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen logs rab kyi sa rol tu byin pa sa spod ma'im sa byama'ams sa thong sa ci bzhin
195a1('bum): bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid dben
195a2('bum): zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid myi dben zhes

195a4('bum): par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang/ chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la myong pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid kyi
195a5('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
195a6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas phyi stong pa
195a7('bum): nyid thug bsngal zhes bgyi bar gyod namacan ma ma pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas spyod pa'i rtsa/ thabs kyi ma'am pas kyi slo pa nyid

195b1('bum): myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la myod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi

195b7('bum): myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa

196a4('bum): stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rakyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas phyin
196a5('bum): stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom/ ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas

196a7('bum): snang ba nyid kyi dben zhes bgyi bar khyod na mtshan ma la 'byod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin las pyod pa'i che/ thabs myi mkhas pas stong pa

196b1('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas stong pa

196b5('bum): pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i

196b7('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe

197a1('bum): thabs kyi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind lal/ 
197a2('bum): myong pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i

197a4('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 'apyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
197a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas las chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
197a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
197a7('bum): tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
197a8('bum): tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
197b1('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
197b2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
197b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/ 
197b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
197b5('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs myi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 'apyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
197b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i che thabs kyi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
197b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar pyod na ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra
197b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la yod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
198a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag mye ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
198a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
198a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
198a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dathabs myi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 'apyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
198a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas don dam pa stong panyid kyi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 'apyod do// 
198a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya la/ bam po bcu gnyis pa // bcom ldan
198a7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs kyi mkhas las 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la 'byodar do// bcom ldan
198a8('bum): 'das kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rtag ces bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la myod // bcom ldan
198b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
198b2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug sngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
198b3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la myong ngo // bcom ldan 'das
198b4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol ra tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong / pa nyid bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skyedo// bcom ldan 'a
198b5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro// lang tu phyind pa la spyod bI tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la gyodado// bcom ldan 'ad
198b6('bum): gas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pashes rab kyilangs kyi da pas byed pa yi mabs kyi khas pas 'dus byem 'angapa nyidas gi zhes 'byib gyod na maca sa la gyod sa
198b7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid dbes zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das
198b8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la byed do// bcom ldan
199a1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar 'byod na mtshan ma la byod do// 
199a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bgyi bar 'apyod na mtshan ma la myong ngo //

199a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod bI tshe/ thabs myi ma'amabs 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar myong na
199a5('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
199a6('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa/ 
199a7('bum): bdag byed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa lnga/ 
199a8('bum): zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa
199b1('bum): mazhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben/ 
199b2('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi
199b3('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'tha' las 'das pa
199b4('bum): stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar gyod namatsham ma la pyod do// bcom da ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nas rab kyi pha rosang tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi sa 'as
199b5('bum): bas mthal las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal 'byod
199b6('bum): ba'i che/ thabs kyi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
199b7('bum): pal pyod pa'i cha/ thabs kyi mkhas pas mthal las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar yod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
199b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas mapal las 'das la stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar 'apyod na mtshan mal 'apyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpam mas
200a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
