200a6('bum): gnyid kyi dben zhes bgyi bar khyod ma mtshan ma la 'gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas thog ma dang
200a7('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar khyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolab tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas
200a8('bum): log ma dpa' ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rtag ces bgyi bar khyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi da pal gyod pa'i che/ thabs
200b1('bum): myi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

200b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs gyi mkhas las thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang/

202a7('bum): zhing pa kyidan rtag ces bgyi bar yod nam can mas byed do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas myod pa'i / thabs kyi ma'am par

203a6('bum): la gyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces paskye
203a7('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do/ bcom ldan 'das kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes
203a8('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
203b1('bum): ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyopyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
203b2('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid
203b3('bum): stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas myi
203b4('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la daspyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sernams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe

209a4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la khyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas stobs rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar myod nas dam la 'gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dang
209a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la khyod pa 'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas stobs rnams zhi zhes bgyi ramyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
209a6('bum): rnam sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen shes ran kyis mothod tu phyin pas spyod pa'i / khabs kyi sakhas pas skyobs rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod nasacanas pyod do/ com ldan 'das gas kyi
209a7('bum): chum sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pogs rab kyipa bang tu phyid pa pa myong ba'i thabs kyi lams pas stobs rnams dben zhes 'byi bar gyod na sacan grod do/ das ga
209a8('bum): rgyal sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol su phyin pa la khyod pa'i tshe / thabs kyi mkhas pas stobs rnams kyi dben zhes bgyi bar khyod mas canas la myod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang
209b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
209b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan
209b3('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
209b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che ngan po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar
209b5('bum): myong na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas las byang chub kyi yan lag
209b6('bum): rnams bdag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'byod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan
209b7('bum): lag rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas byang
209b8('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
210a1('bum): pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe
210a2('bum): thabs kyi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i
210a3('bum): thabs kyi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod
210a4('bum): ba'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag pa rgyad pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
210a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
210a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom
210a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar myod na
210a8('bum): mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
210b1('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam
210b2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas
210b3('bum): pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
210b4('bum): myi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma zhi zhes pa gyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
210b5('bum): tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
210b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la 'gyod pa'i tshe thabs myi sa 'as las 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la myod ngo // 
210b7('bum): kashes rab kyi pha ral tu byand pa stong phrag brgya pa bam lo bcu bzhi // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
210b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas las 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan a la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
211a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi ma'as pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
211a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
211a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
211a4('bum): ya 'gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' ses dadapa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind gal 'gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces
211a5('bum): bgyi bar khyod na mtshan ma la khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'phags
211a6('bum): ba'i bden pa rnams bdag phyed ces bkye bar spyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhan
211a7('bum): pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha romang tu phyind pal gyod pa'i che/ thabs
211a8('bum): phyi mkhas las 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar khyod nam can ma la khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol ba tu phyin pas khyong na/ 
211b1('bum): tshethabs myi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
211b2('bum): la 'gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
211b3('bum): tu phyi nad pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'basam gtan rnams rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha
211b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams mya rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
211b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub ses
211b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub

212a6('bum): rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tshad
212a7('bum): byed pa rnams kyi rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas

212b5('bum): la gyod 'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tshad myed pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi/ bar spyod na mtshan ma la myod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
212b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas tshad myed pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
212b7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas tshad myed pa rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes

213a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
213a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das ga la te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyin pa la yod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar khyod namatshan
213a3('bum): ma la myod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal
213a4('bum): zhes bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs
213a5('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na ma tshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod/

213b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do//

213b4('bum): ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ka/ dal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha pharol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam
213b5('bum): par thard pa rnams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 'apyod bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
213b6('bum): gyi mkhas pas rnam par b.rad pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar myod namatshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
213b7('bum): thabs kyi mkhas pas nas par tha dad pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod
213b8('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rnam par tha dad pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'apyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
214a1('bum): pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par thard pa rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
214a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par tha rad pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
214a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas rnam par tha rad pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' ses
214a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par tha rad pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byangab
214a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam paratha rad pa rnams kyi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
214a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rjethabs kyi mkhas khos mapar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bgyi
214a7('bum): ra myod na macan pa la byed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha 'i la tu phyind pa sa myod pa'i/ thabs kyi mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i sa
214a8('bum): par 'jug pa ras kyi rtag ces bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pas gyod pa'i thabs kyi mkhas
214b1('bum): pas mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i
214b2('bum): tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
214b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs
214b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag myed ces bgyi bar pyod na
214b5('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas
214b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhi zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs
214b7('bum): gyi mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sdod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol / 
214b8('bum): tu phyind pa la khyod pa'i che thabs kyi mkhas pas mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
215a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mya dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
215a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa
215a3('bum): byed pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par
215a4('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa byed pa dmyi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la myod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
215a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi ma lum rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma byed pa dang tshwa nad pa myed pa bde zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// 
215a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thogs rab kyi pha rolapa tu phyin pal gyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas rnam par tha dad pa sgo stong pa nyid dang sachen pa myed pa dang blon dam
215a7('bum): kyan nakyad du rgya mas dpa' mas dpa na sog ro tu byed pa
215a8('bum): rnam pa 'ad pa'i sgo gang pa nyid dang ma can la byed pa dang 'ad pa byed pa dag ces pagyi bar spyod namacan pa la grod da/ bcom ldan 'das gas kyang chub sem sa dpa sems da' ca thogs pa kyi 'ang/ 
215b1('bum): tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
215b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par thar da pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na
215b3('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
215b4('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang smon dpa byed pa ma zhi zhes bkye bar spyod nadatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
215b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par tha rad pa'i sku stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa steHdben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
215b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa mya dben zhes
215b7('bum): bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas mngon par shes
215b8('bum): pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
216a1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma sa byed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa la khyod pa'i tshe
216a2('bum): sa kyi sarnas pas mngon pa shes pa rnas bde zhes 'bye bar spyod na macan sa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyim
216a3('bum): sa 'gyod pa'i tshe 'bas kyi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
216a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas ma ngan bar shes pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la da do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
216a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams bdag myed ce nyes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan mongs
216a6('bum): kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan
216a7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bco
216a8('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i tshe thabs mya mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
216b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
216b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzind rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
216b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas ting nge 'dzind rnams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la myong ngo // 
216b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas depas ting nge 'dzind rnams bde zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la byed
216b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi ma' bas ting nge 'dzind nas sdug bsngal zhes bgyi ba pyod namatsham sa byon
216b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin nams bdag ces bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma sa myang
216b7('bum): ma 'am 'das ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen shes rab kyi pa yad tu byed pa laspyod pa'i thabs kyis 'asalapa nyid 'dzin rnams bdun gyi gyod namamanam pamyong
216b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rolapa tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i sa thabs kyi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams ni zhes bgyi ma gyod namatshan mas kyong do// 
217a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma
217a2('bum): la 'byor do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma
217a3('bum): la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzind rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
217a4('bum): mal khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dang ngal sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pal spyod ba'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgornams rtag ces
217a5('bum): bgyi bar khyod na mtshams la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas gzungs kyi
217a6('bum): sgo rnams kyi rtag ces 'gyi bar byed na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi sakhas las
217a7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bgyim pa pyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rom ba tu phyin pas myod pa'i tshe thams kyi mkhas pas
217a8('bum): gzus kyi se rnams thug bathas shes pakyi bar spyod nam canams kya da / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi ro la tu phyin dpas yod pa'i thabs kyi
217b1('bum): mkhas pas gsus kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma ma gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha 'os tu phyin dpas myod pa'i tshe/ bas
217b2('bum): phyi mkham pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag mye ces pagyi bar spyod na mtsham pas byed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu byid pas spyod pa'i
217b3('bum): thabs kyi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pal dpyod pa'i tshe
217b4('bum): 'bas kyi ma'am pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi 'du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byad chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thoshes rab kyi pha rol
217b5('bum): tu byin dpal myed pa'i rtse/ thabs kyi la'as pasu gsus kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bkyi bar spyod na mtshan pa sa spyod do/ com ldan 'das ga bya chu sem pa dmamamams
217b6('bum): pags rab kyi sa sanas byed pa khyod pas kyi mkhas pas gzungs kyi gnams kyi dbyen shes bkyi ba spyod nas tshams pa spyod do// com ldan 'das gas bya chub ma
217b7('bum): kyi la tu sa da sa sa da gas ma myod dupa byed / 
217b8('bum): ga kyang chub sems dpa seskas dpa chen po gas ras kyi pha rol tu byin pa la spyod pa'i sa mabs kyi ma khasalapa de bzhis gshegs pa'i gro la cwa kyi na kyis rgyas 'i thong na ma rnams kying
218a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha ros pa tu phyin da la la myod pa'i rtsa thabs kyi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsku 'de zhes bgyi bar kyang /

218a4('bum): pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs

219a5('bum): 'ar rig pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtsham sa la myong rdobacom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems da' 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod pa'i tshe
219a6('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rtag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

219b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems

219b6('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar khyod na mtshan ma la khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe sa thabs kyi mkhas pas so so yang dag par/ 
219b7('bum): rig pa rnams kyi dben zhes bkye bar byed na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i che thabs kyi mkhas pas skye
219b8('bum): chen po rtag ces bgyi bar 'apyod na mtshan la la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas las snying rje chen
220a1('bum): po myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 'gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
220a2('bum): snying rje chen po bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas snyang
220a3('bum): rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
220a4('bum): snying rje chen po bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi
220a5('bum): mkhas pas snying rje chen po bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa
220a6('bum): rlabs kyi mkhas las snying rje chen po zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod ma mtsham mal 'byod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i cha
220a7('bum): thabs kyi mkhas pas snyi rje chen po ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mas yod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyin pal spyod pa'i thangs
220a8('bum): phyi mkhas pas snying rje chen po dben zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la 'apyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thas/ 
220b1('bum): myi mkhas pas snying rje chen po myi dben zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i tshe
220b2('bum): thabs kyi ma 'asapas sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ces bgyi bar gyod na mtshan pas myong / com ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ 
220b3('bum): pal pyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
220b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi ma khas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bde zhes/ bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das ka/ 
220b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar myod
220b6('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
220b7('bum): 'dag ces bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi
220b8('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la myod pa'i tshe
221a1('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco'i brgyad zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
221a2('bum): rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 'a

221a7('bum): de ni mtshan ma la khyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang de ltar myod pa ni shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyin dpal khyod do/ de ni gis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
221b1('bum): phal sgom mo/ zhes bgyi bar pyod na mtshan ma nyid la 'apyod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs myi mkhas par rig par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa/

253a8('bum): nang stong pa nyid gi zhes bya bar rtse spyong ga nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar gyi gyod pa rang stong pa nyid hong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ nang stong ba nyid kyi gong zhes bya bar gyi spong rang song ba nyid mtshan ma yod
253b1('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar gyi gyod/ rang song pa nyid spro dang pa yod ces bya bar gyi gyod ga rang stong pa nyid spo rang ba myed ces bya bar gyi spyod ka rang stong pa nyid dben shes
253b2('bum): bya bar myi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la myi spyod de/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ phyi hong
253b3('bum): pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ phye stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi pyodaphyi stong pa nyid bdag

253b5('bum): stong zhes par myi spyod/ phye stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod
253b6('bum): phye stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar myi gyod/ bye stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod de/ phyi nang tong pa

256a1('bum): ma dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis can ma la mye gyod cing / thog sa dang tha ma byed pa song pa nyid rtag ces bya bar gyi gyod/ thog ma dang tha ma byed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar gyi gyod/ thogs dang

258b1('bum): sa tung stongapa nyid be nas bya bar gyi byed/ rab cang spong ba nyid bye be zhes bya bar gyi spong ba dang / das pa kyad mab kyang song sa nyid sa bya sngo dang / ma po myed pa than kyang stong pa nyid kyis

258b3('bum): bya bar ma spong / dngas po byed pa'i ngo bo nyir dong pa nyid mug 'phel zhes bya bar myi spong / dngos po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar gyi spyod / das po skyed pa tsham nyid go ba byed // 
258b4('bum): byed ces bya bar gyi stong gdangos po myed pa'i ngobo nyid shing pa nyid ni zhes bya bar gyi gyod/ dngos po myed pa'i 'tsho dang stong pa nyid sa zhi zhes bya bar myi myong / dngos po byed pa/ 
258b5('bum): 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi gyod/ dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bye stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma 'ayod ces bya
258b6('bum): bar myi spyod/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya bar myi pyod/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
258b7('bum): smond pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bya bar myi pyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag
258b8('bum): pa rnams la myi pyod de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi pyod cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod
259a1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi myod/ drang bapa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ dran pa nye bar
259a2('bum): gzhag pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar myi gyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi byed/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya
259a3('bum): bar gyi kyong / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong zhes bya bar gyi gyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar gyi gyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar gyi kyang / 
259a4('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar myi gyo dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams spo nga pa myed ces bya bar gyi gyo dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya bar gyi kyod/ 
259a5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la myi spyod de/ yang dag par song ba rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi pyod cing / yang dag
259a6('bum): par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya bar myi gyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi pyod/ yang dag par yong ba rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes
259a7('bum): bya bar gyi khyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag myed ces bya bar phyi gyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar myi myod / yang dag par
259a8('bum): spong ba rnams kyi hong zhes bya bar gyi khyod/ yang dag par stong pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi khyodayang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar gyi gyod/ yang dag par spong ba nas
259b1('bum): smond pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams smond pa myed ces bya bar myi yod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi
259b2('bum): spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la myi spyod de/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi skyed cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar
259b3('bum): myi khyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mye spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rjes
259b4('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar myi khyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni zhes bya bar gyi gyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spong / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar
259b5('bum): spyod / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi stong zhes bya bar myi myod rdzu 'phrul gyi dang pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi gyodardzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi gyod / 
259b6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smond pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smodad pa myed ces bya bar myi gyod / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
259b7('bum): bye dben zhes bya bar gyi spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams yo skye khyed ni/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshan pa la myi gyod cing / dbang po rnams rtag ces bya bar gyi khyod/ dbang po rnams kyi rtag ces bya bar gyi gyong
259b8('bum): dbang mi rnapas 'dezhes bya bar gyi spong na dang pornams zhugasas pa zhes bya ba bgyi gyong ga dbang po rnams bdag ces bya bar gyi myong / dbang po rnams bdag byed ces bya bar gyi tsong gdabang po
260a1('bum): zhes bya bar myi myod/ dbang po rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi gyod/ dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar myi gyod/ dbang po rnams myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dbang po rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi
260a2('bum): gyod / dbang po rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi gyod/ dbang po rnams ston ba yod ces bya bar myi myong / dbang po rnams spodang pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ dbang po rnams dben zhes bya bar gyi phyor
260a3('bum): dbang po rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la myi spyod de/ stobs rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / stobs rnams rtag ces bya bar myi myong / stobs rnams kyi rtag ces bya
260a4('bum): bar myi dgyod/ stobs rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyodastob sa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ stobs rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ stobs rnams bdag myed ces bya
260a5('bum): bar myi pyodastobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ stobs rnams myi stong zhes bya
260a6('bum): bar myi pyodastobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyodastobs rnams mtshan pa myed ces bya bar myi gyod/ stobs rnams smond pa yod ces bya bar myi pyod/ stobs rnams smon pa
260a7('bum): byed ces bya bar myi pyod/ stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar myi pyod/ stobs rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi gyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la myi spyod de / byang chub kyi yan lag des kyis
260a8('bum): myi dpyod cing ga byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya bar myi spyodabyang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyodabyang chub kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan/ 
260b1('bum): lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya bar/ 
260b2('bum): myi gyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi pyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya bar myi dpyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi song zhes bya bar myi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag
260b3('bum): rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smond pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smon
260b4('bum): pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi dben zhes bya bar myi khyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
260b5('bum): lag brgyad pa la myi pyod de/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya bar myi pyod/ 'phags pa'i
260b6('bum): la ma ya na lag brgyad pa myi rtag ces bya bar myi pyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bya bar myi pyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi pyod/ 'phags
260b7('bum): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag ces bya bar gyi byed / 'phags pa'i las stan lag btung ba bdag myed ces bya bar gyi rtsod/ 'phags pa'i las yan lag btung ba'i zhes bya bar gyi khyod
260b8('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma zhi zhes bya bar myi gyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa song zhes bya bar kye khyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gyi song zhes bya bar gyi
261a1('bum): myong / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi da'apyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi myod// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
261a2('bum): smond pa yod ces bya bar myi pyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smond pa myed ces bya bar myi pyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa su nad pa myad ces bya bar mya s+yang / 'phags pa'i
261a3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya bar myi pyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi dben zhes bya bar myi pyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la myi pyod de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nas
261a4('bum): kyi mtshan ma la gyi khyod cing / 'phags pa'i bden pa da rtag ces bya bar gyi gyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi/ dertag ces bya bar myi spyod / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'a
261a5('bum): zhes bya bar myi gyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyoda'aphags pa'i bden pa rnaMs bdag ces bya bar myi pyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
261a6('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar myi gyod / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi myod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar myi gyod
261a7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi hong zhes bya bar myi myor/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi gyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi myod/ 'phags
261a8('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams smond pa yod ces bya bar myi myod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smond pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden
261b1('bum): pa rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi 'apyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la myi spyod de/ bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams
261b2('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya bar myi dpyod/ bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi pyod/ bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ bsam gtan
261b3('bum): rnams bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ bsam gtan
261b4('bum): rnams myi stong zhes bya bar myi myod/ bsam gtan rnams ma/ tshan ma yod ces bya bar myi khyod/ bsam gtan rnams ma tshan ma myed ces bya bar myi pyod/ bsam gtan rnams smon
261b5('bum): pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod / bsam gtan rnams smond pa skyed ces bya bar myi spyod/ bsam gtand de dben zhes bya bar spyod/ bsam gtan rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi myod
261b6('bum): pa dang / chad sbed pa rnams la myi khyod de/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi gyod cing / chad byed pa rnams rtag ces bya bar gyi khyod/ tshad byed pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi gyod/ tshad myed pa rnam
261b7('bum): 'dre zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mang byed pa rnams sug bskul zhes bya bar skye rtsod/ rlud byed pa rnams 'dag ces bya bar myi byed/ chud byed pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar gyi gyod/ cad byed pa rnam
261b8('bum): zhi zhes bya bam gyi khyod gamad byed pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar gyi spong / chang byed pa rnams song zhes bya bar gyi spyod/ chad byed pa rnams kyi stong zhes bya bar gyi khyod/ chad byed pa rnams mtshad
262a1('bum): na/ ma yod ces bya bar gyi spod/ chad myed pa rnams macan ma myed ces bya bar gyi spyod/ chang byed pa rnams sond pa yod ces bya bar gyi spyod/ tshad byed pa rnams son pa myed ces bya bar gyi gyod/ 
262a2('bum): tshang byed pa rnams dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mang byed pa rnams myi dbyed zhes bya bar myi myod pa dang // gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gyi spyod de/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
262a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ 
262a4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi pyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
262a5('bum): 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya bar myi khyod/ gzugs myed pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya
262a6('bum): bar myi spyod / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa rnams stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
262a7('bum): myi stong zhes bya bar myi myod gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi byor
262a8('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smond pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smond pa myed ces bya bar myi gyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
262b1('bum): kha rnams dben zhes bya bar myi gyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi byed pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la myi pyod de/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi
262b2('bum): khyod cing / rnam par tha rad pa rnams rtag ces bya bar myi gyod/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams bde zhes bya bar myi myong / rnam par tha rad pa rnams sug bsngal
262b3('bum): zhes bya bar myi dpyod/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams bdag ces bya bar myi dpyod/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar myi dpyod/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par tha rad pa
262b4('bum): rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi pyod/ rnam par tha dad pa rnams/ dastong zhes bya bar myi pyod/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams myi stong zhe/ sa bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams mtshan ma yod
262b5('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod rnam par tha rad pa rnams mtshan ma myedaces bya bar myi pyod/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams smond pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams smond pa myed
262b6('bum): ces bya bar myi 'byod// de bar ba pa deb dpe zhes byab gyi khyod/ de lnga pa dad pa des kyi dben ni byas kyi spyod dang mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myi da'apyod de/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan
262b7('bum): ma la myi spyod cing // mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya bar myi 'gyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ mthar kyis gan
262b8('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
263a1('bum): bdag ces bya bar myi gyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar myi 'apyod/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 
263a2('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar myi pyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
263a3('bum): pa rnams myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces
263a4('bum): bya bar myi spyod/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jugapa rnams smond pa yod ces bya bar myi pyod/ mthar da kyis/ gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smond pa myed ces bya
263a5('bum): bar myi gyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug parnams dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa
263a6('bum): dang / rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la myi pyod de/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i mtsha sa kyi 'ad cing / rnam par thar
263a7('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myi rtag ces bya bar myi myong / rnam par thar

263b1('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa bdag myed ces bya bar myi pyod/ 
263b2('bum): rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa zhi zhes bya bar myi gyod/ rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ma zhi zhes bya bar myi gyod
263b3('bum): rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed dang smond pa myed pa stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa byed pa myi stong zhes bya bar gyi
263b4('bum): gyod/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi drang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa
263b5('bum): dang / smond pa myed pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa smon pa yod ces bya bar myi gyod/ rnam par
263b6('bum): thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa spyodad pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa dben zhes bya bar myi gyod
263b7('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i zho stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma byed pa dang smond pa myed pa myi dben zhes bya bar gyi spyod pa dang // mngon par shes pa rnams la kyi spyod de/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma can pa la
263b8('bum): skye khyod cing / mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya bar phye gyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar gyi 'apyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya bar gyi khyod/ mngon par shes pa
264a1('bum): rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar gyi gyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya bar gyi gyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar gyi khyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar/ 
264a2('bum): myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma yod
264a3('bum): ces bya bar gyi gyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi pyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams smond pa yod ces bya bar myi pyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams smond pa byed ces bya bar myi khyod
264a4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar myi pyod/ mngon parashes pa rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi 'apyod pa dang // ting nge 'dzind rnams la myi spyod de/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi mtshan ma
264a5('bum): la myi spyod cing // ting nge 'dzind rnams rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzind rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'a ji nad rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
264a6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi dpyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzind rnams bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzind rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzind rnas
264a7('bum): ma zhi zhes bya bar myi gyod/ ting nge 'dzind rnams stong zhes bya bar gyi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong zhes bya bar gyi pyod/ ting nge 'dzind rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan
264a8('bum): ma myed ces bya bar myi 'gyod/ ting nge 'dzinang rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar gyi gyod/ ting nge 'dzind rnams smond pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya bar myi gyod/ ting nge 'dzin rjes
264b1('bum): myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la myi spyod de/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi pyod cing / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya bar myi pyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi rtag
264b2('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag
264b3('bum): myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi pyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi hong
264b4('bum): zhes bya bar myi gyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya/ par myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams smond pa yod ces bya bar

264b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la myi myong de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
264b7('bum): stobs rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi pyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa
264b8('bum): 'i stobs rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag myed ces bya bar myi pyod/ de bzhi gsheg pa stobs nas zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhi gsheg pa tob rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi
265a1('bum): pyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar myi gyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong zhes bya bar myi pyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces/

265a3('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar myi pyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi dben zhes bya bar mya dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang // myi 'jigs pa
265a4('bum): rnams la myi spyod de/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / myi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya bar myi spyod myi 'jigs pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ myi 'jig

265a8('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi dben zhes bya bar myi dpyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la myi khyod de/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi 'apyod cing / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag
265b1('bum): ces bya bar myi dpyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi pyod

266b1('bum): bam po bco/ brgyad / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs

267a1('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang snga ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sna myed/ snga las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang sA sA nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sre'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de

269b6('bum): pa ma yin pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa myed/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa rnams par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//

275a7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
275a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs mkhas pas shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
275b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha
275b2('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang spyod do zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// phyi spyod do zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// spyod kyang spyod sa myi spyod kyang myi spyod/ ces bya bar yang myi dmyigs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bus
275b3('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dade ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod ces bya bar yang myi dmyigs/ myi 'byed ces bya bar yang mya
275b4('bum): dmyigs/ spyod kyang spyod la myi spyod kyang myi spyod ces bya bar myi dmyigs/ spyod pa yang ma yin myi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya/ par yang myi dmyigs pa yin// rab 'byor kyis smras pa
275b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dngos
275b6('bum): po myed pa'i rang bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ myong ngo zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ gyi
275b7('bum): spyod do zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// spyod kyang spyod la myi spyod do zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// spyod pa yang ma yin myi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba yang myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
275b8('bum): des chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i rang bzhin du khongs su chud de ma blangs pa'i phyir ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshes des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la pyod pa'i tshe// sems
276a1('bum): zhum pa myed cing / yongs su zhum pa byed de/ myi 'jigs/ myi sngangs/ skrag par myi 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad/ 
276a2('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du nye bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi yang chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed pa ste/ de ni byang chub
276a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzind chos thams skye ba myed pa zhes bya ste/ rgya che ba mchog tu bya ba tshad myed par nges pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis myi 'phrogs
276a4('bum): pa ste/ ting nge 'dzind des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// smras pa
276a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da ting nge 'dzind 'di la 'ba' shigagis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'// chen po myu ra tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
276a6('bum): rgyachub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya 'am 'on tam te lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag kyang yod// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la rnam par spyod pas
276a7('bum): kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myu rang tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yod do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga ting
276a8('bum): de 'dzin dgan / dag gis rnam par pyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myu rab tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ rab 'byor kyis
276b1('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzind dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzinang des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
276b2('bum): chen po myu rab tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rin cen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod de/ ting nge 'dzind des rnam par pyod pa'i byang chub sems
276b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po myu rad tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// seng ge rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod de/ ting nge 'dzind des rnam
276b4('bum): par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur dad tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa dar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge
276b5('bum): 'dzind yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byangachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myu rad tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
276b6('bum): 'tshang rgya'o// zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod de/ ting nge 'dzind nges rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya rang tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
276b7('bum): rgyab tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos thams cad las shi nang du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur
276b8('bum): tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod de/ ting nge 'dzind des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub seMs
277a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po myu rang tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// kyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin/ 
277a2('bum): des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myu ra tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting
277a3('bum): nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myu rang tu bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// nges pa'i rgyal
277a4('bum): mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzind des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur da tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
277a5('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod de/ ting nge 'dzind des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dang // 'asems dpa' chen po myu ra tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
277a6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos thos cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzid des rnam par myod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
277a7('bum): po mya rangab tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// ting nge 'dzind la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par
277a8('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur ba tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// 'od gzer rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang song de// 
277b1('bum): ting nge 'dzind des rnam par yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya rang tu bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// dbubarngam par bkod pa zhes

277b4('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o// nges pa'i tshig la gdon myi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam paragyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur tu
277b5('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzoH/ sa par 'tshang rgya'o// tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'gyu/ ga pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam
277b6('bum): par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myu rang tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// phyogs rnam par smra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ 
277b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin des rnam par pyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myu rang du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// phyag rgya yongs su 'dzind pa
277b8('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyor pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myu rang tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/

280b4('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzind des rnam par spyod da pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myu rang tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs

280b6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rin ce na mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod de/ ting nge 'dzind desan par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myu rab tu bla na myed
