329a2('bum): la da pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
329a3('bum): kyis bka' saN+Dal da pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan
329a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' sa la pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das
329a5('bum): de lta ma lag sa so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ ba sam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin ste
329a6('bum): 'am gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba yad pa// rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig
329a7('bum): yin snyam 'amag gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa// rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems ka nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig
329a8('bum): yin snyam 'am ga gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin ste 'am
329b1('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol
329b2('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bcasad pa// rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsold pa/

329b5('bum): gsol da pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom lda na 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa// rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin
329b6('bum): snyam 'am ga gso sad pa / bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa yad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig

329b8('bum): gzhan zhig yin snyam 'amagasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang
330a1('bum): gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' baHlad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid

330b7('bum): laka rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saN+Dal da pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ 'phags pa'i

331a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam

332a1('bum): snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de smram lags so// / bas po nyi shum gnyis/ rab 'byor
332a2('bum): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ smram
332a3('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du shes nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du shes so// bcom ldan 'das/ 
332a4('bum): 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom ldan 'a ngas rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan

332a6('bum): sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang myig ko/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te gan ba nyid kyang sgyu ma skye sa nyid kyang na ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sna yang gzhan ma lags
332a7('bum): smram yang gzhan ma lags te ga sna nyid kyang smra ma smras nyid kyang snga'o// bcom ldan 'das sde yang gzhan ma lags/ smra ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sde nyid kyang smras/ smra ma nyid kyang khro'o// bcom ldan
332a8('bum): 'das lus kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lus so// bcom ldan 'das yid kyang gzhan ma lags// sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid nyid kyang sgra
332b1('bum): ma sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das smra yang gzhan ma lags
332b2('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sgra nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang smra'o// bcom ldan 'das dri yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dri nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dri'o// bcom ldan 'das ro yA gzhan/

332b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzha na ma lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgyu ma smra ma nyid kyang chos so// bcom ldan 'das myig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma
332b5('bum): lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa 'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang
332b6('bum): gzhan ma lags ka sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags
332b7('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sA'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sbru ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sgo'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags// sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/

333a1('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan srid kyi rnam pa smesawa gzhan ma lags/ smra ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par/ 
333a2('bum): shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan
333a3('bum): 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan

333a5('bum): ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyi/ ra lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus
333a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te
333a7('bum): reg pa nyid kyang sgyu masgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa
333a8('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu mag sgyu ma nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
333b1('bum): lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ smra
333b2('bum): ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yA gzhan
333b3('bum): ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
333b4('bum): kyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// bcom
333b5('bum): ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma la gas/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg
333b6('bum): pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang smra ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang kan
333b7('bum): ma lags pa sgyu ma yang gzhan ma legs te / chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das mye'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mye'i khams nyid
333b8('bum): kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mye'i khams so/ bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rlung kyi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rlud kyi khams so// bcom
334a1('bum): ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang smra ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i
334a2('bum): khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang smra ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
334a3('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/ smra ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// 
334a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ spya ma/ da snang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma smras ti dkyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mying dang gzun
334a5('bum): kyang gzhan ma lags ka sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ myong dang gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das skye mched drug kyang gzhan ma lags
334a6('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te// skye mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go// bcom ldan 'das reg pa yang gzhan ma logs/ spyam yang gzhan ma lags te/ reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma smram nyid
334a7('bum): kyang reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags sum yang gzhanas lags te / cor pa nyid kyang sbrum smra ba nyid kyang tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das med pa sang gzhan ma lags / smram sa ka'
334a8('bum): mamalags te/ sred pa nyid kyang sbru ma sbrum nyid kyang sred pa'o// bcom ldan 'das le nad pa yang gzhan sa lags// smra ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lend pa nyid kyang spyam sprus nyid kyang len pa'o// bcom ldan 'das srid pa
334b1('bum): yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma'/ lags te/ srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das skye ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ smra
334b2('bum): ma nyid kyang skye ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rga shi yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rga shi'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan ma
334b3('bum): lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan ma lags/ 
334b4('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nadapa'o// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang
334b5('bum): gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang sgyu ma// sgyu ma nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha
334b6('bum): rold tu phyind pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam
334b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol da tu phyi nad pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes
334b8('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid
335a1('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang smra ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma la kra/ 
335a2('bum): te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa
335a3('bum): nyid do// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chen
335a4('bum): po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
335a5('bum): ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang don dam pa nyid do// bcom ldan/ 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
335a6('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'dus ma byas
335a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang spru ma pa sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang sbrum/ 
335a8('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ thog ma dang tha ma byed pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ spru
335b1('bum): nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang smra ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong
335b2('bum): pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chos
335b3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa kyang
335b4('bum): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang gi mtsha/ na nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stongapa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
335b5('bum): ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// ba com ldan 'das dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ 
335b6('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa
335b7('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang smra ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
335b8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyidakyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa nye bar
336a1('bum): gzhag pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// 
336a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang sgyu sa/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyang / 
336a3('bum): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dbang po nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ stobs nyid kyang
336a4('bum): sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyai yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan malags te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
336a5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pani/ lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan ma lags/ smra ma yang gan// na ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid
336a6('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags// sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang sprum
336a7('bum): sbru ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang smra ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan nam
336a8('bum): so// bcom ldan 'das tshad myed pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags pa/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chad myed pa nyid kyang spra ma/ smra ma nyid kyang chad myed pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
336b1('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang smra ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan/ 
336b2('bum): 'das rnam par thard pa brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par tha dad pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das mtharang gis gnas pa'i
336b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mthard gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtha rang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
336b4('bum): pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo s+ho// nga pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa yang kazhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rno bar tha rad pa'i/ 
336b5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang man ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
336b6('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma sogs te/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin
336b7('bum): rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma lags
336b8('bum): smra ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang smras/ sgyum nyid kyang gsungs kyi sgornams so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ smra ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 
337a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 
337a2('bum): myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang
337a3('bum): sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// 
337a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
337a5('bum): pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'dra sa bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dun
337a6('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ smram yang gzhanam lags te/ yan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sbrum// smram nyid kyang lan cig phyir
337a7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras cu'o// bcom ldan 'das rgya la 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gzhan sa lags/ sgyum yang gzhan sa lanas te/ phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu kyid kyang smras/ smras te ramyi 'ong ba'i 'bras dur/ 
337a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyum yang gzhan ma lags te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyus/ smra ma nyid kyang dgra bcom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'ang byang chub kyang gzhanas lags/ 
337b1('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang smra ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang byang chub bo// bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lam kyi rnam pa shes pa
337b2('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags// sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang
337b3('bum): sgra ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad pabyed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' brtsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ spra ma la skye ba'am/ 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
337b4('bum): mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa// rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam// gsol pa/ bcom
337b5('bum): ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHsad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye bamyed cing 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed cing
337b6('bum): rnam par byang ba myed pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram// gsolang
337b7('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems// nye bar le nad pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar
337b8('bum): 'du shes dang brda' dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yod dam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems
338a1('bum): 'du shes dang brda' dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gis nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar dmyigs par 'gyur ram/ 
338a2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba la pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes myed cing brda' myed pa dang / gdags pa myed pa dang / tha snyad myed
338a3('bum): pa dang / mying myed pa dang / mying du gdags pa myed pa dang / lus myed pa dang / lus kyi las byed pa dang / ngag myed pa dang / ngag gi las myed pa dang / yid myed pa dang / yid kyi las byed pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / 
338a4('bum): 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabadas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
338a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub
338a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la bsrabs shing myi dmyigs pa'i rgyal gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par
338a7('bum): 'gyur ro// gsolang pa ga bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sgyu ma'i
338a8('bum): skyes bus bslab pa ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyib
338b1('bum): sha stag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung / 
338b2('bum): bar 'gyur ram ga gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar phung po lnga po rjes ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ 
338b3('bum): de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems phyi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thos
338b4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram ga gsol dpag btso dam ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slang zhe na/ bcomade ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rmyi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang
338b5('bum): bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin ni dmyigs su mamachis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' la pa/ ra'abyor de ji snyam du sems/ sbru ma gsu rung ba snga po de dag shes
338b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsrabs shing ga rnam pa thams cad ma khye rod pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ras/ gsol pa/ bco nga 'dod kyi ci'i srang du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di sar smram ni dngos 'o ma mchis
338b7('bum): pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ smra brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab
338b8('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sla
339a1('bum): bstan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' baN+Dal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ myig yor
339a2('bum): lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du
339a3('bum): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sa 'di ltar myig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor
339a4('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ chu zla lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la bsrabs shing / rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
339a5('bum): 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis
339a6('bum): so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' lad pa rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems smyig rgyu lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
339a7('bum): nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das deni 'di ltar smyig smra ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis
339a8('bum): ba'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ spruld pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs
339b1('bum): shi rnam ma thams cad pakhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gso sang pa/ bcom ldan 'das don kyi 'gyur ro// de ci'i drud na rnyen/ bcom ldan 'das dis smra sa ma thom pa
339b2('bum): bzhin te// dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa ya ba// rab 'byor de ni 'dis ru gzugs ni phyis ma sA zu/ tshor bani skyi las su bu/ 'du shes
339b3('bum): nargyalas k+Sha bu/ 'du byed ni phyi lam lta thA rnam par zhes pa nimyilas pra ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po nug no// de ni phung po spyi'o// de dag ni dang song ba nyid kyi phyi spyi phyogs byo/ 
339b4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyimyi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid phyir myi dmyigs chen po stong pa nyid phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong
339b5('bum): nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir// myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi rgyaso// mtha' sas 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 
339b6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dor ba skyed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin spyod pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dbyis
339b7('bum): so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyig so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir phyi'o
339b8('bum): dmyigs so/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du byed ni sbru ma lta bu/ rna bar shes pa ni ts+tsha
340a1('bum): lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de dag ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir
340a2('bum): dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas
340a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong
340a4('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyi gas so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 
340a5('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu
340a6('bum): tshor ba ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ 'du byed ni smra brnyan lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid
340a7('bum): kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa
340a8('bum): nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
340b1('bum): myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi
340b2('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
340b3('bum): gzugs ni myig yor lta bu/ tshor ba ni myig yor lta bu/ 'du shes ni myig yor lta bu/ 'du byed ni myig yor lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni myig yor lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// 
340b4('bum): ded ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa de nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir
340b5('bum): myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
340b6('bum): nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi
340b7('bum): phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyig so
340b8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga gzugs ni chu zla lta bu/ tshor ba ni chu zla lta bu/ 'du shes ni mu zla sta bu/ 'du byed ni rgya zla swA bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rtsa zla lta bu ste/ rno bar
341a1('bum): rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phye stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so/ 
341a2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir
341a3('bum): myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi'o
341a4('bum): dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid
341a5('bum): kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga gzugs ni smyig rgya lta bu/ tshor ba ni smyig rgyu lta bu/ 
341a6('bum): 'du shes ni smyig rgyu lta bu/ 'du byed ni smyig rgyu lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni smyig rgyu lta bu ste// rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 
341a7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dbyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs
341a8('bum): so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// mgu' ltas 'das pa spyod pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs blo// thegs dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so/ 
341a9('bum): donga'i skye ba stong pa'i kye phyir gyi dbyig so rang bzhin stong pa hUM kyi d+hI sI dmyag po chos shes ca stong pa 'i kyai hrI khyi bI b+ha gi se DA ki a dzA ny+dzi stong pa ny+dzi k+Shi hU~M myi phig so phyi'i byig la stor pa nyi kyi phyir mye'i myig po'i skye sa steng po hriM kro pheM m+b+hi myog so bri ny+dza stong po nyi hU~M hrI myi dbyig so dngos po byed pa stong pa nyi mya myog so// bla 'byor gzugs 'i
341a10('bum): la bu lcu ba 'u slo sa su la ste 'aM ni ga gipe yi badre'i dru / rung mo gnin stong 'i ni phyir kyi byin sa byin du kyi ltu ba nyid kyi phyir gyi byin pa po dazungs nyid kyi ti
341b1('bum): kyi phyir myi dmyig so// chen po stong pa 'i ga phyir myi dbyig so// dros pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir gyi dmyig so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir gyi dmyig so yashA mra 'dra ba spong pa shA kyi bu mi dmig go 'og ya tha ma sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 
341b2('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyig so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs/ 
341b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// gsol
341b4('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstand pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing skrag par myi 'gyur ba lags grang / bcom ldan 'das
341b5('bum): kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da gal te byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du gzhugs pa yang yin/ la/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la thabs kyang myi mkhas pa zhig/ 
341b6('bum): ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gi lag tu yang ma 'ongs na/ 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par yang 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom lda na 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstand pa
341b7('bum): 'di thos na/ myi 'jigs myi sdang / myi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
341b8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar rtogs te myi dmyigs so// tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar rtogs
341b9('bum): te de myi dmyigs so// 'du shes myi rtag ces bya bar rtogs te myi dmyigs so// 'du byed myi rtag ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
342a1('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpas khyod sa mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
342a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// 'du shes sdug pa
342a3('bum): ces bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
342a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i// zab sa mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor dgazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
342a5('bum): pa'i che ba rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi sa/ gzugs bdag myed ces bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// 'du shes
342a6('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// 'du byed bdag myed ces bya bar rtog te de phyi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
342a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la daspyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa
342a8('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// tshor bzhi zhes bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// 'du byed de
342b1('bum): zhes bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i thabs
342b2('bum): mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis// gzugs stong
342b3('bum): zhes bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis// tshor ba stong zhes bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ldan pa'i sems kyis
342b4('bum): 'du shes stong zhes bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thos cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
342b5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub/ sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la
342b6('bum): myod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor dgazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis// gzugs
342b7('bum): mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i seMs
342b8('bum): kyis/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
343a1('bum): kha nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas/ 
343a2('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs smon pa myed ces bya bar rtog
343a3('bum): te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ tshor ba smond pa myed ces bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes
343a4('bum): smond pa myed ces bya bar rtog te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thos cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed smond pa myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thas cad mkhye/ 
343a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa smond pa myed ce sa bya bar rtog ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
343a6('bum): tu phyin pa la khyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la khyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa
343a7('bum): sems kyis/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar rtog ste re myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs so// 
343a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis// 'du byed mngon par
343b1('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa la myod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor dgan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyis
343b2('bum): pas khyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs dbed zhes bya bar rtog se de myi dbyig pa 'o// rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rtsor
343b3('bum): pa dben zhes bya bar rtog se gyi dmyigs so// rnam pa sa cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lda pa' mem kyis tugs dben zhes bya ba tog se de gyi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad sa khyen/ 
343b4('bum): ma nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar rtog ser byi myigs so// rnam pa thams cad ma byed da pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mi mas kyis/ rnam par shes pa dber zhes bya bar rtog nyi kyi kyis
343b5('bum): so// rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myor pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi
343b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs myi rtaka bI na sum par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
343b7('bum): ba'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba myi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes myi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyis
344a1('bum): so// ne pa thams cad sa khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed kyi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam
344a2('bum): par shes pa myi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pyod pa'i
344a3('bum): thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
344a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par/ katogs par byed de/ de myi mya gas so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
344a5('bum): ba'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid
344a6('bum): la bya bas 'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed sdug bsngal
344a7('bum): ba'i rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa/ sdug bsngal ba'i/ rnam par gtogs
344a8('bum): par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la/ spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// 
344b1('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la
344b2('bum): bya bas gzugs bdag myed pa'i/ rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag myed
344b3('bum): pa'i rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag myed pa'i rnam par gtogs par
344b4('bum): byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed/ bdag myed pa'i rnam par gtogs
344b5('bum): par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thos cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa/ bdag myed pa'i rnama'
344b6('bum): par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ spyod pa'i thabs
344b7('bum): mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
344b8('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
345a1('bum): tshor ba'i ba'i rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhye rang pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi ba'i rnam par/ gtogs
345a2('bum): par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed zhi ba'i rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnas
345a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i/ rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
345a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la myong ba'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor dag zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
345a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs song ba'i rnam par gtogs par byed de/ 
345a6('bum): de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stod pa'i/ rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad ma byed
345a7('bum): ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byas pas 'du shes spong ba'i rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la byas pas/ 
345a8('bum): 'du byed stong pa'i rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la byas pas/ rnam par shes pa spong ba'i rnam par gtogs par
345b1('bum): byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'dzin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor dgazhan
345b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ pyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma myed
345b3('bum): pa'i rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la byas pas/ tshor ba mtshan ma byed pa'i rnam par gtogs
345b4('bum): par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed
345b5('bum): de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhye/ nad pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par gtogs par byed de/ 
345b6('bum): de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa zas
345b7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
345b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor dgazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyid
346a1('bum): pas rtsod pa'i mi rnam pa thams cadas chen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i sangs byas gzug sa brjod pa byed de rnam par gton sa par byed / de byi myig pazo
346a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas som basmon pa myed pa'i rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de phyi dbyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
346a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes smon pa myed pa'i / rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dbyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid sa byab sa
346a4('bum): 'du byed smond pa skyed pa'i rnam par gtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs pa// rnam pa thams cad mkhye da pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i mings bya bas
346a5('bum): rnam par shes pa stond pa myed pa'i rnam par gto/ gas par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// ra 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
346a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi sa rol tu byin pa la da pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor dga' na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis
346a7('bum): rol tu phyind pas spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa'i rnam par gto/ 
346a8('bum): par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cadamakhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mngon para'adu bya ba myed pa'i rnam
